title: Test before releasing?
review: This app is really poorly written. There are a number of issues with it  such as, i have messages from the nurse and it won't pull them up. It shows 9 medications and when i look at them, there none. It keeps telling me that I need to link my provider, then when I try and link my doc, it says that she's already there. It's a waste of time. Just like when the developers considered testing before releasing. The early version worked. This one? Removed.

title: Awesome
review: Can't complain but, one suggestion that your notes that we add show up for our Dr's to be able too see or print out for them so we can discuss with them. The notes disappear on your appointment date but other than that it's an awesome app

title: Worthless app
review: I‚Äôm a physician and I would be embarrassed to have my patients try to use this extremely poorly designed app.  Undoubtedly, like most electronic record systems in medicine, this app was not designed for users and healthcare providers, but for accountants and office managers.  I would wonder if the app is as bad on that end as it is on my end.  And I‚Äôm sure this ‚Äúservice‚Äù is provided at an incredibly high cost, despite its poor functionality.

title: App won‚Äôt load
review:
I‚Äôm giving a one for the current issue. Generally it‚Äôs kind of clunky and you can‚Äôt reply directly to emails here you have to create a new email EVERY. TIME. BEYOND ANNOYING. 

Currently the app loads and then gives an error message as soon as you try to click a message. Wish it worked better or the developers would fix the issues. Might try to uninstall and reinstall and see if that works.

title: FRUSTRATING
review: App and website are different.  Can log into website but not the app.  All removed my other two children, now i can‚Äôt add them!!  Trying to make an Appt online - wants me to again find out ped dr that‚Äôs already listed in the file and yet states in the search he doesn‚Äôt exist!!  I have so many better things to do than deal with inefficient madness!!  Going to be easier to just call the office when it opens!!!!!!!

title: Useless
review: Started setting up a week before appointment. App wouldn‚Äôt accept password for provider portal, so I had to change password.  Then it said my I Mac wouldn‚Äôt support televisit even though it met all operating requirements. So I put it on both iPhone and iPad. Morning of appointment went through all set up again to make sure it worked. Then I sat 45 minutes in front of a screen saying Dr ‚ÄúX‚Äù would join shortly. His office then called and said we would do a telephone call instead.

title: Very helpful in my medical care
review:
The practice and hospital I use for my medical needs are very responsive to my messages and in getting results of various tests.

I love this app because I know my physician will be reading my words directly and not from a message left with receptionist or nurse.

title: Forced to follow
review: I have been a long time user of this app, and loved it!!   Until, I was forced to have to set up a passcode for my phone to be able to use the app.  I have never used a passcode on my phone and I don‚Äôt want to now.  My phone is never left out and is always with me.  So, please change the app, so that you can use it without having to passcode your phone.

title: Forcing passcode
review: I was finally getting the hang of this app but now it‚Äôs requiring me to put a passcode on my phone in order to use it, which is ridiculous. What do I have a pin for then? Make a better password system instead of a 4  digit pin if you‚Äôre worried about security. Don‚Äôt make someone passcode their WHOLE PHONE. Wont be using this until that feature is removed.

title: You agree to have adverts served to you in your doctors portal
review: The second time I used this app, it started me over with a new onboarding process, as if I had never used it. This onboarding made me agree to the t&c before I could read messages from my doctor. As is typical, they reserve the right to alter the deal whenever they like, without notice. They all require you to agree to be served adverts. I deleted the app and used my doctors website instead.

title: Needs improvement
review: I sent a message to my doctor on Thursday during the day and the sent messages show it sent at 2:30am today, a Wednesday. I went to the support tab, it won‚Äôt load & neither will the report a problem tab. My WiFi is full bars, it‚Äôs not my end. The app is alright and useful to see RX but if the messages aren‚Äôt correctly sent out how can you document correspondence precisely through it?

title: Absolute nightmare
review:
The whole login and password interface is completely unusable on the iPhone.
The text entry fields continuously go out of focus, so that it‚Äôs very hard to copy secure passwords from your password manager in. On top of that the password quality verification is so broken that it claims that a 31 character password with special characters is a weak password. I‚Äôm an iPhone user since model 3 and rarely have I seen such a useless iPhone app.

title: Once incorrect DOB recorded, cannot add new providers
review:
My 1st provider input wrong DOB. Once I discovered it, provider fixed it but this app does not sync so now I cannot add any more new providers because of DOB mismatch. Broken since mid 2019

‚Äú.... information won't sync to the healow app automatically as this has been reported as a known technical bug and our technical teams are already working on this issue. ‚Äú

Also, only works in portrait mode, really not intended for iPad. Very bad implementation and deserves 0 stars!

title: Frustrating Bugs
review:
This site has a few bugs that need to be worked out. The doctor‚Äôs office phone number was entered 4 times before accepting it. 
The state where I live is not Alabama - but I don‚Äôt care how many times I scrolled down to my state and made my selection then pressed ‚Äúdone‚Äù I could not change the state location from Alabama to the correct state. 
You think that maybe why the system can‚Äôt locate my doctor? He is not in Alabama! 
ü•¥ Frustrating system!

title: Useless
review: This app takes forever to retrieve data. It takes ok 2 minutes to switch from my appointment list to the notes on one of those appointments. The text is so small and light gray that the only way to read it is to take a screen shot, increase the contrast, and then zoom in to the part I want to read. What a complete waste of my time. I will share this info with my doctor‚Äôs office and ask them to find an app that will be helpful to their patients.

title: Really not a good app
review:
I use this only because my doctor‚Äôs office uses it. Does not work well. Not intuitive and generally difficult to get anything done. Hard to believe my doctor couldn‚Äôt find a better app. 

Specifics-very difficult to order a new prescription. Impossible to turn off the reminder to take my pills. Been trying to turn it off for a while and there just isn‚Äôt a way to do it.

title: Issues connecting FitBit
review: The app takes me through the process without a problem until it comes to actually allowing access to data. When I tried to report the problem through the app it said I had made an invalid request.

title: User friendly?
review: This app is not very user friendly.  When trying to find my provider the app had a hard time locating my Doctor by name.  I finally searched by clinic but I still couldn‚Äôt select my doctor from the list.  Really clunky but then it has two party authentication (probably required by some HIPPA law) so kudos for having the two party authentication.

title: Not user friendly
review: I love the theory, but this app is not the least bit user friendly. If the point is to link all your providers together for easier communication, why is everything so separate and difficult to navigate? Trying to set up a new account with a dr office is a nightmare. Since that‚Äôs done it‚Äôs not so bad but there are definitely improvements to be made to the user platform.

title: Clumsy and Useless
review: One would think that an app such as this is meant to make things more convenient, but this app fails miserably.  It really serves no useful purpose.  For example:  An obvious function (to me, at least) of the app would be the ability to export an appointment to the iOS calendar.  With this app, it‚Äôs not even possible to copy text for the purpose of pasting into the calendar. Furthermore, if you go to the calendar (or anything else) you have to log back onto this app. N

title: Dismal onboarding experience
review: Wants everything. Required everything. Forced you to engage or not have access to labs. Twisted twisted or just badly designed. This app is an example of why there are trust issues between people and service providers. I just want my bleeping results. I don‚Äôt want to authorize a million things and as soon as I get my results I intend to record and delete the app and all such permission.  You made it weird and creepy.

title: Glitches
review: Was working great and had all my info and my doctor‚Äôs and my spouses. I asked them to find a doctor for me because I could not and BOOM all my info erased completely and won‚Äôt let me sign in or start over as it can‚Äôt find my doctor‚Äôs all of a sudden. Do not follow the prompts to find one of your doctor‚Äôs. They will lose all that you have in there. What a giant headache!

title: Statements & Paying Bills
review: I haven‚Äôt had to use the app for anything yet except for looking at my statement. My doctors office said they uploaded my statement to the portal. But I cannot find it anywhere. There does not seem to be a billing or statements feature on the mobile app.

title: Cannot change or correct email address
review: Attempted to fix an issue with current email address there is no link to change or correct, you cannot email to correct......limited help available for non Doctor related questions

title: Cant sync with Apple Health or schedule appts
review:
Compared to a lot of over health provider app, this app doesn‚Äôt do much. 

i‚Äôd like to be able to sync the data here with Apple Health so i wouldn‚Äôt have to try to navigate this app‚Äôs difficult UI. 

My provider doesn‚Äôt seem to receive any messages i send through the app, and also doesn‚Äôt respond to any appointments  requests

title: Could use some improvements
review: I like being able to communicate with my doctor and see my meds. Would be great if we could communicate back and forth with the same thread. It‚Äôs frustrating hack g to start a new one with every reply. Please fix this. It should function much like epic/MyChart

title: Terrible
review: If I could give it a zero I would. Worst patient portal ever. I‚Äôve decided based on current experience with two practices using it to switch out of both practices to ones which use a portal more user friendly. They do exist-both U of M and Henry Ford have better ones that do not send you a blizzard of contradictory messages or notify you of appointments a week AFTER they happened, are more compatible with Chrome.

title: Please improve the interface!
review: To for example, request a prescription from my doctor's office, I have to take multiple screenshots and zoom in, just to be able to see what's on the screen! PLEASE update the app with better contrast and a bit larger buttons and icons! The app itself is pretty good, but the interface is just way too hard to read for even slightly visually impaired people. Like me.

title: Mr
review:
I have been using the older version of the app since my doctor suggested me, After upgrade to this latest version I am totally amazed with the enhancements they have did. 
The best part of this app is you can be aware about the upcoming appointments.

title: Instant Accessibility
review: I really enjoy being able to communicate with my doctor‚Äôs office and getting my questions answered through the app and even refill my prescriptions.

title: Why the changes on‚Ä¶.
review: I have used this healow app for a long time. Recently, I noticed that I have been receiving a message, stating that I need to go into my settings & make a passcode before I can use this app or even get into my phone! I think I should have the option! Not be ordered to do it. Thank you, Subra 333

title: Great idea, not quite there
review: Great idea and it serves it purpose and then some. Unfortunately it does not offer the more popular devices to sync up with(a section you are able to share with your health providers). Hopefully that will change, especially with the way healthcare is now.

title: Can‚Äôt enroll multiple family member and no help
review: I tried to figure out how to enroll three children. I can only enroll one. I tried to access support but there‚Äôs none available unless you have a problem with your login ID or your password. There is no online chat and there‚Äôs no way to email this app admin. Unfortunately I had to delete it from my phone and tell my doctor that we won‚Äôt be using it.

title: Notifications
review: By any chance can notifications work? If I get a test result or a message from my provider, I have to manually go in and check if anything is there. I have notifications enabled in iOS settings but there are no notifications from the app, and no settings to manage notifications in the app either.

title: Too nosy
review: This app REQUIRES microphone access, camera access, and notifications to be enabled. Unless you‚Äôre doing a telehealth appointment, there‚Äôs no reason to need the microphone and camera. This is a privacy issue, which a medical app should be aware of. And it should be up to the user to decide if notifications should be enabled. I will not be using the app until these issues are fixed. I‚Äôll have to resort to calling the office.

title: Ignores
review: I have had the app for many years. When I want to add two new providers - it does not find them even with their respective codes. O,d app is same...but has a 4 number pin. It should not be difficult! It app mentions ‚Äúyour credentials provided ....by physician...‚Äù yeah right! When I use my user name and password - it works for one provider but comes up invalid on the other..and yes I used the proper codes etc. one sign in should work for all!!

title: App is really slow
review:
The app is taking very long to load the data . Sometimes after waiting a while, an error message appears and needs to be restarted
The idea of the app itself is very good and I find it very useful but needs improvements.
Also the vitals should be kept in the historic . Much more useful for me as a patient

title: Fine when it works
review: My clinic switched to this app a few months ago. When it works it does what I need. However, today I needed to request a medication refill and send a message to my doctor. The app is running so slow it felt like being back on a dial-up connection. Additionally, I kept receiving errors when I tried to send a message to my doc. Just doesn‚Äôt seem very reliable.

title: Worse health app ever used
review: This app is full of glitches and its so difficult to make it do somethin right. I have being tryin to connect my provider to the app and I just cant because the app just stay in the same page even after me clicking next, try with name and address and its the same. The only way to access my stuff is thru the browser link the doctor sent me! The app is really bad!

title: Not Impressed
review: When asked to log in, it always says my info is incorrect even when I know it‚Äôs not. Why ask for a pin and a password when you don‚Äôt remember either?  Finally, it can‚Äôt seem to locate my doctor or the practice. Very annoying and frustrating app to use. More like, can‚Äôt use because it doesn‚Äôt work.

title: Worst medical practitioner APP
review: This app may please the medical practitioners, but it is user unfriendly and 99% of the time the practitioner cannot be located.  It fails on several fronts:  practicality, time, and justification of it's difficulty to use.  Hello!  Not all patients are computer whizzes.  I have a good grasp of how to operate most other apps in this field, but I‚Äôm not going to spend  time trying to communicate in this manner when there are many great, safe apps available.

title: Medical records
review: My doctor is with optima and I am seen in Prescott, AZ.  They are so great about updating my records! This ap is great! I always forget my appts and I can look on this ap very quickly to see when my Appointments are! It‚Äôs so fast too! Thanks

title: Hideous login experience
review:
The mobile app uses a PIN to log in, not the credentials from the web site. It should allow me to use the web site credentials and my password keychain to store the credentials.

Also, it seems that if I don‚Äôt log in often enough, the credentials expire. I do not see my doctor that often, so the net result is that every time I try to login, I have to phone my provider and reset the password.

title: Not so great, but could be.
review: Glad we have this connection to our doctor. When composing messages, the search feature does not always find my doctor, and there are too many steps to go through to compose a message. Can I isolate or save my doctor‚Äôs name so I can just automatically send a message to him?  Right now I don‚Äôt see a way to do that.

title: Useless App
review: I do not know if it is a problem with the app or a problem with HCA/St. David‚Äôs  practice administration, but the result is that this app is useless.  There are always issues with logging in and today (June, 2020) the latest data I could see was from April 2019.  This type of thing has been an ongoing problem.  If you try to talk to the clinic people about it, they just complain about all of their issues with the software.

title: Worst Health App Ever
review: My physician has wasted money on this application.  Even after the support desk helped the office with the appointment section of the app, the only thing I can see is past appointments.  On top of that, I can‚Äôt see anything in most other sections of the app.  This app doesn‚Äôt even work on my desktop.  If it were up to me, I‚Äôd fire this company because there are better apps out there.  I know this because my other physicians have apps that work very well.

title: No Apple Health Connection?!?
review: I like this app, it keeps all my doctor I for in one place, but I'm extremely disappointed that I can't connect my Apple Health App or my Apple Watch! If this app is available on the Apple Store, why can't I connect anything Apple related to the app?! It's the best way to track health on iPhones, what sense does it make that we can't connect it?!?! Please add support for this...

title: No special characters allowed?
review:
Every time I try and send a message to my doctor, I have to go back in and remove any ‚Äòspecial characters‚Äô before the message will send. Apparently an apostrophe counts as ‚Äòspecial‚Äô??

Please repair it so that shortcuts like the use of conjunctions, ampersands, etc are allowed. Having to comb through my message and pull out characters in order to get my message to send is driving me bananas!

title: Love the convenience
review: The platform for this app is awesome. I think the only thing I dislike about it is it does not send you notifications. I have to manually go in and look for a response even though the settings I have are sent to allow for notifications.

title: Horrible experiences
review: I absolutely hate this app. It‚Äôs very difficult to navigate. I received emails telling me that I have appointment visit notes available and then I get to the app and I can‚Äôt find the notes I‚Äôve looked everywhere and nothing exists. Sometimes I receive an email saying that I had an appointment on such and such a date and that appointment never existed. Again I absolutely hate this application

title: Pay Bill
review:
I‚Äôve with Acton Medical in MA and the simple thing I‚Äôm trying to do is pay my bill. I cannot pay it through the App, and the payment section of the portal website won‚Äôt show all the fields on my iPhone 12 Pro Max to be able to see all the fields to enter the data to make my payment.

Aweful App and service, and way worse than FollowMyHealth the previous service which worked.

title: Review
review: I really like this app. Easy to used and I got a response from my doctor in less than 24 hours without having to wait on the phone. üëç

title: Can‚Äôt use the app
review:
In the past, I have loved this app because I could access all my records with my doctor. However, a recent update is now trying to require me to set a passcode on my IPhone to use the app!! 
I have always had a passcode for the app, but I am not going to be controlled by an app to lock my entire phone with a passcode just to be able to use this app! 
One app is not going to dictate how I use my phone!!

title: Needs improvement
review: With all the new technologies that are out the  app could use a major overhaul.  It would be extremely helpful to be able to link the app to apple health and to be used on the Apple Watch.  Especially since the watch can measure heart rates, oxygen, exercise etc and report it to your physicians.  Gives a whole new meaning to healthcare.

title: Poor in most aspects
review: Prepare to write text in a very limited fashion‚Äôs like no punctuation marks etc. and prepare to get logged out and then locked out or unable to login on a regular basis. Many doctors want you to sign in through portals and you have to use their application unfortunately instead of all of them getting together and using a universal portal you get this - a really poor choice of a software package for a doctors portal

title: Can not login
review: I just downloaded the app and every time I try to search my doctor with the three options available the search comes out blank page and even if I try the option that can‚Äôt find my doctor it also comes out blank so I can‚Äôt find my doctor to login even though I can login using google browser but the app doesn‚Äôt work at all. Please fix it ASAP

title: Ok, needs help
review: Initial login is very clunky, could be much more streamlined.  The app is very slow in accessing the data compared to logging in to a patient portal on a web browser.  In addition you really can‚Äôt do anything with the app but view data.  No ability to fill in forms/questionnaires.

title: Developers could do better with this app
review: I love the idea of this app but functionally it does little to help manage my health.  If you want limited reporting and communications with your health services Healow is for you. So much potential but delivers almost nothing.  There are hundreds of medical provider apps that will read data from an Apple Watch but not Healow.  I think this app has cut lots of corners and sold health care groups vaporware.

title: Bad software
review: I used the app on my old iPad , no problem. Just got a new iPad the app will not recognize my last name. Went to the company website couldn‚Äôt send e-mail. Tried to logon again , it said to verify me it will send me a text message, no text message ever sent requested again, no text. Tried a different way it said we will send  me an e-mail , no e-mail ! Finally got the e-mail , totally useless! Not even going to go on with this story it‚Äôs ridiculous.

title: Incredible App!
review: I love the new app.  It is so easy to login, very intuitive to use.  Easy access to all my records. My lab and test results show up quickly and are easy to find.  Easy to email my doctor.  Love everything about it.

title: Easy to use
review: Love the app & having email access to my doctor is a great improvement over calling the office. Records are right there, easy to find, test results too. Love it!

title: Good start but needs a lot of patches
review: I can‚Äôt see previous messages or reply to old ones. They disappear after being opened. I couldn‚Äôt refill my meds; the option isn‚Äôt available even though it says I should be able to.

title: Housewife
review:
I was told I needed to update my app, the app I have will no longer work. This is what I was told when I went to open my previous app so that I could order my meds. Now that I have downloaded the app I can not even open it, so now what I had on my previous app is lost. Not happy with this app at all. With times being like they are I‚Äôm needing to refill my prescription, and can not do so.

Not happy customer 
Jean

title: Concerned user
review:
Tried to use app for another doctors office. Could not find the section that lets me refer to the other practice. This makes it impossible to use for the new doctors office.
This review section won‚Äôt even allow me to send comments.

title: Increasingly helpful
review: The more I use this the more I like it. What I like most is being able to share lab results with other doctors as opposed to having to rely on an office sending them along for me. Kind of empowering. I am also able to track my results as needed.

title: Punctuation not allowed???
review: In trying to send an important email to my doctor the app would not allow it to be sent due to ‚Äúspecial characters‚Äù within my email. I removed any parenthesis and italics but the error message continually appeared until I removed every single apostrophe, comma and period! What kind of app doesn‚Äôt allow ANY punctuation at all?? Thank s makes no sense!! It‚Äôs unacceptable and incredibly frustrating when trying to send a message!

title: Ideal For Medical  Appointment
review: This application made it easy for me to keep up with all my medical and dental appointments. Ever since I‚Äôve been using this app I‚Äôve made it to all my appointments and been keeping up with everything that‚Äôs going on with myself medically.

title: Slightly useless
review: Why don‚Äôt you require providers to make all information available?  Only 2 fields are provided.  Not very useful.  I can‚Äôt even see my height and weight.  Contacting my provider won‚Äôt do much either, since there‚Äôs no request button, I have to talk to someone who has no idea how to fix it.  Would be four stars with these revisions.  Also why can‚Äôt you Touch ID to login?

title: Overall decent, needs integration
review: Please keep us updated on plans to integrate to personal health profiles like Apple Health. It would be very helpful to be able to sync my data monitoring with my physician.  Especially with the current situation where remote appointments are needed.

title: Very difficult to read
review: I like the layout of the website. I completely dislike the font size - way too small. Also colors of text on backgrounds. Small very light white on gray or blue background. Likewise, small blue text on white background. You have a good system, just a poorly designed usage of font size and color backgrounds.

title: Nice concept ~ bad interface
review:
I have 2 different medical providers and the app does not provide an easy process for adding the 2nd provider.  After logging into the  ‚Äúdefault‚Äù or 1st provider set up there is not a clearly evident or easy way to set up a new different clinic.

The Healow designers should review the MyChart app to see how to design a better interface and an easy process for setting up additional providers.

title: Needs updates
review: While this app is convenient, it frequently does not work properly. It is very difficult to add other providers to your account. I use an iPhone 11 and find that the interface does not respond when I select buttons when trying to add new providers. For a medical app, this needs attention.

title: Do The Developers IT people even READ these Reviews???
review:
It‚Äôs obvious no one is reading these reviews by everyone trying to use this app to navigate their doctor portals. 
If you read them you would be replying and fixing the issues so it is useable and user friendly. 
You should be able to search for Dr‚Äôs and get results. 
You should not have to have different
 sign -ins for each doctor portal. You be able to select between your different doctor portals under ONE sign-in. 
Life is hard enough these days. Why have an app that doesn‚Äôt work. 
It‚Äôs useless. 
üôèüèºüôèüèºüôèüèºPraying all the issues get addressed and fixed so Everyone can use this what would be a Wonderful app. ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è

title: Just ok so so
review:
I appreciate having information at h  as bd and bring able to see current visits and test results, but cannot understand why I can‚Äôt update simple things like a dated of an illness or date of a surgery or my Drs phone number. 
I can‚Äôt even list prior surgeries that I‚Äôve had done. Should be a place for that info as well from patient history other than just some Dr notes.

title: Not showing results like it used to
review: When I want to check out my results to compare to the more recent results the screen is blank. It used to show them. Also it takes forever to load to see them when they did show. I‚Äôve tried it on my iPhone and now I‚Äôm on my iPad and it still hasn‚Äôt improved. It did the same on my iPad. Yes I‚Äôm using a good WiFi.

title: Many many functionality issues
review:
Does not show ‚Äúnext‚Äù appointment correctly. 

Example. I have two appointments scheduled this week. On Monday. Tuesday‚Äôs appointment does not show in appointments. Nor past appointments. 
Friday‚Äôs appointment does show. 

Tuesday afternoon. After Tuesday‚Äôs appointment. It now shows in past appointments. And fridays appointment ( which was displayed until Tuesday afternoon ) is ‚Äúmissing‚Äù. 

However. The follow up appointment from Tuesday ( scheduled in December) that‚Äôs visible. 

Programmers are indexing from 0 and 1 and dropping records whey should be displaying. 

The support folks say use the website  cause the app has issues. 

Exactly what use is an app if you have to call the provider and wait on hold to verify accuracy of appointment info ????

title: Send message
review: I just spent about 40 minutes trying to send a simple msg to my Doctor because it kept saying it wouldn‚Äôt accept a special character like an apostrophe.  Luckily, I was finally able to figure out what the issue was.  But, why does it care if there is an ‚Äò in the message.  You need to fix that!

title: Great Idea- Needs features
review:
It is a great idea to have a place where as a patient you can get all your medical activities. 

I cannot find where I can add my children or have multiple people on the app. 

There should be a robust help feature that at least shows you how to do the things the app does. It is easy to get list circling around choices, but. It getting to what you want.

title: Application Review
review: The app continues to improve with updates. It would be helpful if there is a way for you to send a message to update your records, particularly on the new supplements you are taking. I would be interested in applications that may interface  with this app.

title: Very convenient
review: It‚Äôs so easy to find my appointment information, my med list, my lab results & so much more. It‚Äôs easy to send messages to my Doctor. It‚Äôs easy & convenient . I enjoy the Healow app very much.

title: Keeps closing out! Please fix!
review: This app works great usually. Today it‚Äôs just asking for my passcode over and over again saying there‚Äôs been an error. I can‚Äôt use the app at all. Iv updated and still the problem is happening continually. Please fix this bug. I need to be able to log in and access information.

title: Healow is a huge help!
review: I like having my last results at my fingertips, as well as next appt, Insurance info. Wish you could connect with my Physician also. Not sure if that is an app issue, or due to my dr office restrictions. Would like to view previous results also.

title: No refills
review: You can look for hours and not find how to request a refill. This app is how the Doctor wants you to request a refill. True the pharmacy can request a refill but that request goes to the staff not the doctor. You could wait forever and not get your refill.  The app is a great idea but it seems the best way to request a refill is the old fashioned way...call the office during office hours. If they answer you‚Äôll get your refill.

title: Email editor needs work
review:
It‚Äôs nice to be able to email your doctor. Unfortunately I couldn‚Äôt send that to my doctor because of the ‚Äò in the word it‚Äôs... the editor won‚Äôt take it.

Also it would be nice to send pictures as most doctors can see if a wound is healing correctly of if it might warrant an inspection in person.

title: Health Kit integration needed
review:
The fact that this app doesn‚Äôt tie into IOS HealthKit data is the dumbest thing around. My dr. could easily have access to daily blood pressure, weight, pulse, you name it from the wealth of sensors in my watch and what I enter in. 

So instead I get to email screen shots or hold my phone up for them to read. Get with the program Healow.

title: Very helpful
review: I have enjoyed using the app.  I even added my family so I can keep track of their appointments too.  I can even set it to remind me of appointments.  I like how easily I can see results of tests or X-rays.  I recommend this app

title: Crappy waste of time and collector of sensitive personal info
review: Linking multiple docs is not easy or helpful. Date of most recent appointment went in as a 3 years ago event. Family linking is near impossible of course with HIPPA restrictions on child info despite the fact that children do not follow up on their own care at age 13 to 17. Managing multiple Healow accounts on a crappy app is no dream. Send me my reports via secure messaging please. Do not waste money on this sham, doc practices!

title: Great!
review:
love it!
wish all of my doctors and providers used it to have them all in one place!

only wish you could send photos or add pictures of your license / insurance card for both you and the office to see.

title: Almost useless- at best
review:
The overall font on iPhone is is very very small, with no option to enlarge it. Apparently the developers never tested their work.
Mail INBOX is available, but not SENT mail. Cannot refer to previous message to Dr, so you have to begin from the top AGAIN, trying not to forget what you sent the first time.(since last message not visible)
Very clunky to use overall

title: Had web based experience and outdated everything
review: Calls it Touch ID despite being FaceID. Requires a lot of permissions to work for no good reason. Makes me question the privacy of this app. The UX is terrible. I wish my provider went with a different one. In fact, this might be a good reason to change providers, since I‚Äôm not really that satisfied with my current provider anyway.

title: Garbage App
review: This app is garbage. I was able to finally log in when I discovered my doctor‚Äôs office spelled my email address (user I‚Äôd) wrong when they set me up; however, when they corrected it and sent me a new user ID which is confirmed on Healow app when I follow those instructions, no matter what I enter as my password, it tells me invalid login credentials. Good thing I don‚Äôt ha e a weak heart, or this ‚Äúhealth‚Äù app would kill me. Just trash.

title: It‚Äôs areal pain in the A
review: Not very friendly to setup. No desktop or Windows app. Can‚Äôt contact support the they have questions set for you no place ask about your issues. Screen set for mobile phone and still remain horizontal no way to turn it vertical. Would be a nice app if cleaned up and medical users would update.

title: Great app?
review: Terrible in terms of user friendly, not intuitive in the least. I was able to submit request for med refill after many attempts to do so. ‚ÄòAdding‚Äô meds literally has multiple meanings in the app you guess which one you want. Finding your pharmacy is also fun, hint after putting in name of pharmacy hit magnifying icon to get list of local stores rather than going thru list provided by search which is endless.

title: CIMA Board of Directors
review: How could you purchase such a low grade, low quality app?  Everything about it the look the feel and the content says I don‚Äôt care about my patients, I think as a patient we are worth more that this High School prototype of an app.   I got an email from CIMA telling me to go into the app and pay my bill.  What a joke the app doesn‚Äôt have a billing or payment tab, or anything that looks like the place to go to pay a bill.

title: Makes life easier
review: I like how it works, easy to contact my doctor & see lab results as soon as they are posted. Can manage appointments.

title: Like this app
review: I like and use this app quite often. Ir is much better than waiting on hold for minutes, sometimes many.

title: OK
review: So much easier if the appt reminder just came direct by email instead of email to go look at Healow.  So what?  Not very informative, can view only in portrait view (inconvenient on an iPad with attached keyboard), slow on update.  I don‚Äôt see the point, except this is the only way my surgeon‚Äôs office is willing to communicate (or not!).

title: Waste of time
review: I was pretty sure I had this app but took for a long time to reset my password. It won‚Äôt let me add new names and keeps taking me to the same place over and over, even though I have 2 different pediatricians for my kids. I tried for well over an hour and I still don‚Äôt have it figured out on how to add 2 more people.  What a waste of time I will never get back.

title: Worst app
review: I find it to be the worst app you can have to communicate through with the doctor..while outside US , you can open it but messages can‚Äôt be read. You would have to keep on trying even to open and then composing /read a message is a nightmare. I was able to find the immunisations my baby had done, guess what the next day they are there or at least no showing. Horrible app, I hate it.

title: Piece of crap
review: I forgot my password. Easy enough to solve. Or it WOULD BE if this stupid app would recognize that I have changed my password but instead it just keeps insisting it‚Äôs not the right password even though I JUST CHANGED IT. So it wants me to change it again. Okay. Whatever. Different page this time so I‚Äôm like maybe it will work. WRONG. Put in a new password and click the log in ‚Äúbutton‚Äù BUT WAIT. ITS NOT A REAL BUTTON AND WHEN I CLICK IT IT JUST HIGHLIGHTS THE WORDS LOG IN.

title: Absolutely terrible
review: I hate that I am forced to use this app in order to communicate with my doctors. It hardly ever works. The messaging concept is broken half the time. It doesn‚Äôt show the providers to even message the doctors. It runs so slow and doesn‚Äôt even load half the time. The notifications don‚Äôt even work so I never know when I get a message until I go into the app. This app is absolutely useless and I hate it.

title: Difficult to Use For Multiple Accounts
review: This app may work great for one user but having to manage multiple accounts (like for my kids) is extremely difficult. The interface needs to be greatly improved to be able to handle that smoothly. The app is slow and extremely frustrating to use and I‚Äôm pretty computer savvy, so that‚Äôs saying a lot. Would not recommend.

title: Good app
review: Having the ability to see test results and compare them with earlier results is extremely helpful as is the ability to consult with my doctors via email.

title: Very poor
review: This is the 3rd app I have to use to communicate with my healthcare team.  This is the worst.   No ability to email my provider or send documents from other providers.  I have to print out my labs, etc. and hand carry them to the office.  Not user friendly to the patient, maybe there is something in it for the provider but so far for me useless.  Talk me out of it, please

title: Unreadable
review: I just installed this app so I don't know how useful it will be.. It's unlikely I will use it much however, because it is almost impossible to read.. Whoever designed it obviously wasn't a 64 year old guy with poor vision.. Light blue background with white print? Seriously? And it diem size to a tablet. It's still cellphone sized, even on the iPad. Really poor design.

title: Well made app. Trackers are limited
review: I like the app in general. Seems well built. However, there‚Äôs not enough support for devices. The list is fairly limited. Needs support for Amazfit Bip and Apple Watch to name a few. Also, needs to be able to share data with Apple Health app.

title: 1990s technology today
review: I use this app to communicate with my doctors office. They seem to be bringing on different features of the app slowly. I was very happy to see them embracing a more modern form of communication but they made a serious blonder by selecting  Healow, it is like take a step back in time. I can‚Äôt reply to a message from the staff. I have to create a new thread each time and there‚Äôs no spell checking. Hello, 1990 called and wants there email program back.

title: Great app
review: Perfect app for keeping up with appointments and sending messages for a quick response. With everything being paperless and no phone communication now, lol. This is great! No being on hold forever! All around love the app.

title: It‚Äôs great!!!
review: LOVE I‚Äét!!!! Just moved to the area and getting established with the Drs. I work so it‚Äôs especially awesome. Can look at my appt. and results in 2 seconds and upload appointments to my phone calendar. Love I‚Äét!!! Where has I‚Äét been all these years!!!!!???

title: Good app
review: The application has worked well. It would be nice to be able to access using biometrics. Also, would be nice to be able to adjust some information dealing with medication when providers input them wrong.

title: Half baked
review:
A few major releases from now, this could be good. Messaging is probably 80% of the purpose, but this is very constrained. I hate to say it... it's faster to wrestle with the infernal automated telephones that almost all practices have.

There is no record of sent messages (really?) and no record that messages were received, so when a practice does not respond, where was the problem?

title: Poor message design
review: I‚Äôve gotten a few messages from my doctor‚Äôs office, but I have to scroll ACROSS the screen to see the entire message.  There‚Äôs just one line of text that goes a really long way.  It‚Äôs a very difficult way to read a message.

title: Worst app ever used
review: Keep getting emails saying I got a message from my doctor. After login in it takes about 3 minutes for everything to come up then when I click on the message file it takes another 2 minute to open and then it says I don‚Äôt have any messages. Don‚Äôt know why I keep getting emails when I don‚Äôt have any messages.

title: Working fine
review: I was having issues with the app when I moved to iOS 15. It‚Äôs working fine now and the app works fine now. Could be laid out better but overall it‚Äôs a nice app that works.

title: Nice App But It Forces Access To Phone
review:
I *can not* recommend this app. The Product Owner in their arrogance requires you to grant the app access to your phone‚Äôs microphone & camera for the ‚Äúbest‚Äù experience.

You do NOT have a choice I the matter.

If you do not grant access, the app can *not* be used.

It is *not* the place of any company to determine for me what I will and will not allow them access to on my phone.

It is *my* phone and not there‚Äôs.

If granting the access provides the ‚Äúbest‚Äù access, then I, the customer, should have the option to choose & decide for myself the experience that I want. If I want the less than ‚Äúbest‚Äù experience, that is my choice.

App deleted.

title: Won‚Äôt even load past opening screen
review: I got this app for my GP‚Äôs office as they recently started using it. I can‚Äôt even get it to load past the initial page with the name on it. No option to log in, just frozen. Reinstalled multiple times and still no use. Really annoyed bc I was hoping to have access to my records through the app and link to my Apple health app

title: Gets the job done
review: The app is fair, but the messaging area could really use some work. I‚Äôm constantly having to re enter my pin when I‚Äôm mid message, and the special character restrictions in the text is absolutely maddening. Please, just let me type what I need and not have to go back to re-engineer my message.

title: Healow app
review: First it will not allow for you to add doctors after your initial set up. After that it wants you to log back in and then will not recognize your login information or it will give you an error message stating your login is already in use. The help section doesn‚Äôt help! Go figure! You can‚Äôt get most information on here anyway so what‚Äôs the purpose?

title: Great App
review: Very useful for reviewing appointments, medical records and sending notes to my doctor.  However one minor issue is that even though I can use it with my iPad, it does not rotate on the screen when I‚Äôm using my iPad with a keyboard.  Aside from that, I really do like this app.

title: Why no special characters?
review: I LOVE this app and that I am able to communicate with our families doctors, but it‚Äôs kinda dumb that I had to go through and delete all of the apostrophes because they are an unacceptable special character. Inconvenient when you‚Äôre trying to send off a quick message.

title: Great app to have
review: I would like to say this app is amazing and I am aware it does take time to fix bugs and broken links. What I seem to be finding is a problem with my account switching emails. It would be a lot easier to get things situated if I could actually speak to a person.

title: Works for me
review: The app works great! I like that it keeps track of everything in one app.  My records were available as soon as the doc had the results. No issues so far.

title: Wonderful way to document labs
review: User friendly with a great interface! I can send messages to my doctor and have all my lab reports for review.

title: Obnoxious
review: Only lets you open it when you put a pin on your phone. I do not want a pin on my phone. Don‚Äôt intrude on my personal choices. I hate this app. So when I use it I have to put a pin on my phone, enter my apple ID to confirm the pin, enter the pin to confirm the pin, enter the pin for the app, open the app, close the app, and then repeat the process to turn the pin off on my phone. Obnoxious.

title: This app is a Nightmare!
review: Doesn‚Äôt recognize me even though I am registered. When I attempt to sign it, the requests keep looping and repeatedly requesting name and birthdate.  No way to order prescriptions !  States provider (that they can never recognize) has not made Message Compose available. You therefore can NOT message for assistance. I have to call office directly for every prescription !

title: Terrible app with limited to no support
review: The on-boarding flow is buggy and broken for both the Healow mobile web and iOS apps. Not only am I unable to signup for an account which I need in order to obtain my rapid COVID test results, there is no support or help available for sign-up problems. This is inexcusable for an app of such high importance as to entrust with healthcare. This is a huge oversight and a major failure.

title: You broke it
review: This app worked pretty well until they ‚Äúfixed‚Äù it yesterday.  Now I can‚Äôt do or see anything.  So I logged out‚Äî nothing.  Deleted and reinstalled and now it won‚Äôt even let me search my dr or login. I‚Äôve had this app for years.  Please ‚Äúfix‚Äù it so it works again.  It‚Äôs Very frustrating that this doesn‚Äôt work especially in today‚Äôs world and circumstances.

title: Would be great with some improvements
review: It can be a bit tricky to use - especially trying to figure out how to request refills. I think it took me 20 minutes the first time I tried. Just needs some small improvements.

title: Primitive/harassing reps
review: I had a question about a payment on the account which they referred me back to my primary dr to fix.  I get it, their app is still kinda primitive, fine.  But then the consumer support reps kept emailing me asking why I wasn‚Äôt responding.  What other business is this aggressive? At first, I was trying to be nice and explained I didn‚Äôt really want the app anymore but they would not stop emailing me.  I had to flag them.  App deleted, never again!

title: My prescriptions never seem to reach the pharmacy
review:
So this app performs like hot garbage. The email function is difficult to use or understand. Changing information like pharmacy address and phone number is next to impossible.

Confusing, difficult, distracting are just some of the words to describe this. I am all for new technology but I‚Äôll stick to using the phone going forward to communicate with my doctors.

title: Worst app ever
review: This is the worst app I have ever used. I thought I paid the bill last month and I received another bill and I‚Äôve been sitting here for over an hour trying to pay the bill and it keeps spinning and spinning. It says not to close the page or I may be paying twice. Evidently, I‚Äôm not paying it all. I could‚Äôve driven down to the Toledo clinic in paid the bill in the amount of time my fooled with this app

title: Useful app.
review: This is a useful app. I have two different providers who use it and it is a good tool to keep records, emails  etc together. The main complaint I have is it that it keeps uninstalling one of the practices and I have to keep adding it back.

title: Zero Stars- horrible app
review: Never works or allow account set ups. I have two offices that use this app, thus I need to have two different providers on my account. I have found it impossible to get it to log into the server. More than frustrating, it‚Äôs worthless. I wished my Docs would use a different service. If I could give this app zero stars I would

title: The most poorly designed app I use
review: My doctor uses Healow so I message him via the app.  Can I check my sent messages?  Nope. No archive. You can‚Äôt even check that it sent correctly. Nothing more needs to be noted ‚Äî if you can‚Äôt check your own writing, you aren't using a serious app.  I don‚Äôt get it?  Are there incentives for the docs because there are none for the user.

title: Passcode
review: Don‚Äôt force me to use a passcode on my devices in order to access my medical information on the app. which has a passcode to get into it already. I purposely don‚Äôt use a passcode on my devices and that‚Äôs my choice, not one you have the right to choose for me. This should be an option a user should be able to turn on/off if they want added security.

title: Kludgy and cumbersome
review: Switched to new phone and had to start from scratch. Games can follow us from phone to phone. Stores, banks and fitness apps can follow us from phone to phone. Not this one. Latest problem: I can‚Äôt have two providers offices on the app. It used to just be cumbersome, now it‚Äôs actively frustrating.

title: Great idea, but....
review: I love the idea of being able to access all of my care information in one place, but so far the only information available is my appointment schedule and lab corporate results. I want access to everything else like the stats, meds, locate other doctors, billing, etc.

title: Seems only to work with one doctor
review: I have three doctors who subscribe to the service - my primary care doctor and two specialists. I can access all three of my doctors on the web.  But apparently, once I've used the app for one doctor, i cannot exit and use it for another doctor.

title: Good app
review: If you‚Äôre looking for a patient / Doctor app that works well this is it. Appointment, lab results, follow up messaging from your doctor, prescriptions, this is a great way to stay in touch with all those needs.

title: Terrible connection issues
review: Neither the web site nor this app allow me to log in, as the web site gets hung up loading and the app says it can‚Äôt connect to the server, and this happens regardless of WiFi network or LTE, regardless of device, with no other problems with any other web site or app on either device I‚Äôm trying. These are some serious performance issues.

title: I love it!!!
review:
I can leave my Dr. little updates, make emergency appointments and even get feedback from my physician without being on hold forever.
I can verify my meds and get appointment reminders,, what more do you need?
"I DO NOT NEED TO WAIT BY THE PHONE FOR MY DR. ANYMORE".

I love this app!!!

title: Confusing interface, doesn‚Äôt sync with Apple Health
review: I‚Äôm not sure why an app would have such a confusing interface and then not sync with Apple Health Records. It‚Äôs practically useless because none of my health data from this app will end up in the right place with all the other data in the Health App.

title: So slow, help/support doesn‚Äôt work
review: I have two children, but I can‚Äôt figure out how to add both of them to the app. It can never find their doctors. The help/support doesn‚Äôt search after I type in the question or let me even type the question. It won‚Äôt show me a number to call for help. I miss our direct text messaging system with our doctors :(

title: Hate this app
review: This app is not user friendly at all, it‚Äôs very confusing to use. It won‚Äôt let me link my 2 children in the app so I have to TRY to log in separately for each even though they go to the same doctor. It now will not let me log in to one of my daughters accounts and also cannot find the doctor when I search for them.

title: It's all good
review: I've never had a problem using this app and I even jumped around a lot on it. I never had it crash or anything. Like you said, it's only as good as those entering the info.

title: I can‚Äôt be the only one...
review: So far, this app has been a huge waste of space. I tried using the app to change an appt and never heard back from the doctor‚Äôs office. I‚Äôve sent messages using the app only to never see a reply. Today was my breaking point - I received an email with my upcoming appointment information as well as directing me to use the Healow app. I open the app and the appt is nowhere to be found. This is insanity!!

title: Nice!
review: I love this app! Easy to use and straight forward. I haven‚Äôt had any problems this far and I‚Äôve been on it for 7 months.

title: Excellent updates, GREAT APP!
review: I can send refill requests with additional notes to the medical staff.  Love the UX and options for accessing and making changes to my records and patient requests.

title: Useless
review: This app is really not setup to do much of anything. Although I can sign in, that is about all that is available. I am not able to review my Personal Health Records, not able to view and pay any bills, not able to review any test results or really anything that I think a patient would be interested in doing. A totally useless waste of time.

title: Have not been able to get this app to function
review: Plain and simple, I get to where they ask you to agree to their terms and the app stops working with a message to try again later. I waited a day, still nothing, uninstalled and reinstalled, still nothing. I need the test results on the app, so it is less than useless - it is a hazard.

title: Essentially Useless
review: When signing into an app makes a computer literate individual feel as confused and frustrated as their 98 year old grandpa, there‚Äôs a problem. Tells me my password is invalid and sends me a link to select a new one, but clicking on it simply advises me that the link has expired. Multiple times. I‚Äôm so glad my health and medical data is in such capable hands.

title: Portrait view only
review:
I am SICK and tired of apps that I have to turn my iPad sideways to view.  If you can‚Äôt offer an app that will adjust to whatever viewing position is being used, the. I have to presume your software engineers not interested in producing an easy to use for anyone app.

Contrary to what the ‚Äúunder 30 crowd‚Äù might think, not all of us are chained to out cell phones!

title: Bad
review: Am trying to switch to a family account because both mine and my young son‚Äôs doctors use this app. It‚Äôs a pain. I can‚Äôt switch between patients to view my portal I can only see my sons portal trying to get help is a joke. No tech support I hate emailing someone would like to talk on the phone with them so I can fix the problem today not 3-4 days later.

title: Worthless, like most medical apps
review: I‚Äôm supposed to order my monthly medications through this, it never works. I‚Äôm either logged out and dealing with tons of unnecessary security for my own protection which I never asked for or I‚Äôm clicking around on the nice clean screen that is so clean and "flat" that it has no options. I‚Äôve hated this app for three years, glad I could get around to posting about it. app is worthless.

title: Helpful app
review: It‚Äôs easy to communicate with the office.  Much easier than waiting for a call back.  I check my appointments, request a reschedule and check results.  I like it.

title: Hard to use
review: This app has so much potential but it‚Äôs not even easy to set up. My three-year-old is listed as the primary and I am listed as her child and my other two kids aren‚Äôt even on there. I cannot figure it out and can‚Äôt seem to get any help. This is not user-friendly in anyway and is completely impossible. Absolutely useless and I hate that it‚Äôs even connected to my office that I love.

title: Works well enough
review: Works well enough to get basic information from/ to my doctor. However, i know its not being utilized to its full potential by my provider. This is not a technical issue, but a doctor office problem. It would be nice if it synched with follow my health that my insurance uses.

title: Capital Family Medicine Raleigh NC
review: I only recommend this wonderful caring family practice. Thank you to all the staff & especially my doctor, Dr. Mallory Lake for all of your kindness & care. It makes all the difference in the world to have a great doctor!

title: Useful but lacks some basic functionality
review: This is useful to keep track of medical records but has some annoying shortcomings such as no apparent way to delete messages or edit existing medications with changes of dosage or frequency.

title: Sad little app with limited usefulness
review: Really not ready for prime time especially in the area of being able to share any health data recorded into Apple Health (regardless of source - Apple Watch or a 3rd party BP monitor or Bluetooth glucose measure device etc).  All those can save to Apple Health - why not at least have ability to connect to Apple Health ???  You think they‚Äôd do that - they do NOT !!!

title: Not good
review: This app is infuriating.  You go through a variety of steps to link a practice, and that only works about 50% of the time.  Then it doesn‚Äôt remember who you are.  Today it told me I have no account, despite the fact that I was in it earlier this same day.  And yesterday.  I give up.

title: Font options
review: Would be nice to have an option to change font size. Some of us older folks have trouble reading the data when making entries.

title: Lousy app
review: I recently switched doctors and thus, because this doctor uses this app, had to begin using it. It pales in comparison to the MyChart app. I‚Äôve had issues getting logged in to the system, and even when I do the message/email system rarely works properly. Can‚Äôt believe I may have to switch drs because of the app their office uses, but I may have to.

title: Horribly Designed and Non-Functional
review: The more I use this app the more I see its shortcomings.  I‚Äôm guessing that the group that designed and developed this didn‚Äôt do much to provide the basic features a user actually needs, but instead rushed to get it out to the world to meet some deadline.  I‚Äôve used their online portal for years since my doctor uses it and it‚Äôs just as bad.  Wish there was an alternative.

title: Pretty bad.
review:
Sometimes an app is so bad you wonder if the people who made it have ever actually used it. 
This is one of those apps. 
Nothing makes any sense and basic operations like cancelation of appointments aren't am option. 
Try checking in for an appointment a few minutes after the time. You can't LOL. 
If you can't get the basics right what's the point?

title: A great tool
review: This app is very user friendly. You can access your next appointments and see what medications you have been prescribed in the past as well as lab results.

title: A terrible app
review:
This app is so bad it is hard to imagine how any self-respecting IT professional could select it for us for their hospital or medical practice. 

For example, and just one example, the email creation process does not preserve paragraph breaks or offer any standard formatting tools. When my doctor receives my message it is just one big lump of text. One sentence after another without a paragraph break anywhere. Is this 1980??

Mark Orton

title: Never works
review: Never loads properly (if it loads at all). Always says I have new messages, but won‚Äôt ever load the actual message.  Very clunky. Gave it a solid 12 months to see improvement before writing a review and it seems even worse then when I first had to start using it. I have actually avoided doctors that use this app.

title: Worse than useless
review: The app does none of the useful things like scheduling appointments or reviewing labs or paying bills. Just has all your personal medical visit info that should be private. Even the Dr‚Äôs office says it is useless and a waste of time. I am deleting it, unfortunately they keep all your private medical info that they gathered without you permission anyway.

title: Pretty horrible basic features
review:
Can‚Äôt read messages well. Have to scroll in one line. Why would you employ idiots who create features like that?!!! Can‚Äôt respond to messages. I have written to my doctor to use something better.

Really horrible user experience.

title: Use to work perfect
review: Not sure what went wrong but I use to be able to read an entire message from my doctor in the messages. Now I can only read the first line. I then have to log in on a computer which make the app obsolete, honestly. I use to love this app but won‚Äôt use it anymore unless it gets updated and fixed.

title: Terrible app login nightmares
review: I have attempted to log into this app online and via the app several times over the last few months.  Despite changing the password successfully, I have never been able to log in.  Have wasted hours. Please do not select this app for your practice.  You will lose both patience and patients!

title: Unable to communicate with provider
review: I‚Äôve tried and tried numerous ways to send a note to my provider and every time the system tells me he‚Äôs not found. When I open the portal his name is right there in the page so I‚Äôm not sure how this can be happening. Frustrating!

title: App Could be Useful
review: I was looking forward to using this app to communicate with my Dr but very time I try to use it, I get a headache and thoroughly frustrated. Have you looked at the size, color  of the  font? . What happened to using the color black for letters? The font size is microscopic , a true challenge for us that don‚Äôt have 20/20 vision. It might look cutsie by definitely impractical

title: Ridiculously slow
review: It took me no less than 10 to login on my computer because the website is ridiculously slow and this app behaves the exact same way, browsing once you‚Äôre logged in is just as painful. Obviously it takes a lot less time to call my dr than having to deal with this.

title: Results do not get updated anymore
review: It says that I haven‚Äôt been to the doctor since may 2019 which is a lie. My results from last week isn‚Äôt even on here, I had to call and get them over the phone which is annoying and inconvenient considering the long wait over the phone and hold times when I could‚Äôve just looked on the app like I normally do. Please fix!

title: Better before!!
review:
Worked better before! Every patient I talked to at the doctors office says that they are having problems getting to their information on the site. 
Wouldn‚Äôt let me in my account even though I was standing in the doctors office and they reset it.

title: Not great
review: I love the idea of being able to view my results, appointments and things on an app but unfortunately the test results section is totally incomprehensible so you still have to call to ask to get them, on top of that I get emails saying there‚Äôs new information available like a visit summary, and then when I open the app it‚Äôs not there. Great in theory, doesn‚Äôt work properly for me.

title: Don‚Äôt bother
review: This Literally happened. When signing in for first time I got to a page that wanted me to agree to privacy conditions and there were no documents to view. There was an empty container that reads, ‚Äú place policy here‚Äù as though either I should have some contract to put there, or my doctors office has no idea how to work this app either. Why would anyone agree to something they can‚Äôt see?

title: Review
review: I have tried for 10 days to download this app and find out information regarding an imaging appointment I have on November 5, 2018. I was told I would have the imaging and immediately following an appointment with the surgeon. I cannot confirm that. I called the office and was told I had an appointment with the surgeon at 11:15 that morning. Was that for the imaging or is that not on his office schedule? This web site is not customer centered. It is useless.

title: Worst app and customer service
review: I have been back and forth with them for weeks now with an issue. Then I get logged out and can‚Äôt get back in.  So now another issue.  Then finally got back in with no help from them and now back to same issue I originally wrote about.  I can‚Äôt stand it.   It‚Äôs not worth it to me anymore. Technology isn‚Äôt always the greatest thing especially with this app.

title: Dissatisfied
review:
The Healow website and the Healow app do not contain the same information. It makes it very difficult to manage information by having to remember which device allows you to access which feature.

Managing med lists in this system is cumbersome and unintuitive. I ended up using a Google spreadsheet because it made more sense.

title: Awful, can't read light tiny text
review:
My phone is my primary device but I have to use my computer to see notices from my doctor. 

The text is tiny and light gray on a white background. No way to increase text size, or change color to black. I can't even copy the text so I could paste it into notes or somewhere I could read it. 

Hope it improves because it's useless to me currently.

title: No Records
review:
The app is a good idea BUT
I went to my Dr. Visit almost 2 months ago and No Information has been filled in. What good is the app if no one is going to update it???

title: The Worst
review: This is absolutely the worst app I have ever used for healthcare. It‚Äôs impossible to change my insurance or add insurance through this app‚Ä¶ I‚Äôve tried everything. The only thing it got right was my appointment time, however, the info for me to check-in is incomplete so I‚Äôll have to wait until my actual appointment to give correct details.

title: Trash
review: This app is worthless. Only good for looking at upcoming appointments. I can‚Äôt make payments on it like every email says. I can‚Äôt view any lab results in it like every email says. I have some messages that asks me to review something and when I click on it all I get is a blank screen.  This app should never have been released. Developers should be ashamed.

title: Excellent app
review: I‚Äôm able to communicate with my medical provider and access most of my health care information.

title: Functional at best
review: The login process is full of server side, ambiguous errors. Even after login, certain menu items will spontaneously generate error messages. UI is functional at best. You‚Äôre better off just signing in on a desktop computer and using their website.

title: Please give more color options
review: The light blue background with small white text makes this app incredibly difficult for me to use.  I would love to give it a better rating otherwise, but this blue and white combination makes it an exercise in frustration every time I open it.

title: So many bugs
review: my provider created an account with a temp password. Told me I‚Äôd set up a new one input some info, no big deal. Except the app keeps me stuck in this loop of resetting my password over and over. When it accepts the new one it takes you to login, it‚Äôs successful and goes back to the reset password screen. Kind of hard to use for telehealth when I can‚Äôt even get into the app.

title: Easy and organized
review: Best app ever all the information I need from the doctor is right there. So much easier to keep up with appointments and updates

title: A good start, but could use some improvements
review:
I‚Äôve been using this app for several years, and I am disappointed that the company behind it has not done a better job of improving its performance and reliability. Below are a few of the issues I experience:
 
1. Frequent crashes 
2. App reports that account is not attached to a provider
3. Inability to support multiple providers in a profile
4. Inability to book an appointment from the app (although that may be due to a provider‚Äôs limits, but I don‚Äôt know)

The web site works fine. Too bad the app cannot create a similar experience for us.

title: Convenient!
review: I was dubious about this app, but it has become my go-to instead of phone calls for simple questions. Very convenient and saves time.

title: Keeps Timing Out
review:
Messaging is wayyyy too difficult keeps timing out too soon. Keep having to enter a 6 digit pin makes it even worse.

Bad when having to get something to paste into in, etc. for that reason.

title: Great app for my life
review: I love being able to contact my doctor or seeing my medical records whenever I want.  Plus it‚Äôs easy to use and doesn‚Äôt require at rocket scientist to use.  Great app thumbs up.

title: Great App
review: I'm a 71 year old senior and I find the app easy to use and contains all the information I've ever looked for.  It's like everything else, the more you use it the easier it becomes.

title: Falls short of my former portal
review: Difficult to use. Cannot find doctor in system. Cannot use to correspond with provider. Cannot share daily blood sugar testing data easily. Tests involving imaging inaccessible. Not all of my health team of physicians participate in this portal, making integrated care an unnecessary challenge. Much preferred MyChart / Epic.

title: Healow
review: This is a great app it helps me keep up with appointments and unless you have to password or Face ID they can‚Äôt get in I recommend it to everyone.

title: A great app, but....
review: Would it be possible to add face recognition as another way to automatically sign in? Some of us have upgraded our phones and don‚Äôt have Touch ID any more. Thanks.

title: Working again
review: Latest update had to install several times, then had to logout and log back in.

title: Not working so well lately
review: Always found this app to be quite useful but when I went to review latest test results, I found the tests listed but no results showing. Also true of previously listed test results. Doctors office confirmed the results show on their end so must be an issue with the app. Deleted & reinstalled to no avail

title: Works well, needs TouchID/FaceID
review: This app works quite well, which is more than can be said for most healthcare provider apps. Zero frustration...except the whole PIN thing. I get wanting to protect data when phones are frequently shared and handed to friends, but a PIN when we have TouchID and FaceID? Please add support for these!

title: Hard read
review: I find it difficult to read the info on the app. The type size is tiny. That wouldn‚Äôt be a problem but it‚Äôs white on a light color background. Why make it so difficult?

title: Helpful tool to use
review: I find this app helps me keep tracker of all my medical records and information plus allows me to e-mail my doctor to discuss an issue without bothering the nursing staff. Thank you

title: Work in Progress
review: Don‚Äôt bother loading this, works intermittently, missing records information, will send endless notifications of past appointments to the point of you having to turn off notifications for this app. Maybe someday they‚Äôll get it right?

title: Bugs
review: Idk what happened to this app, but for the last few days, every 30mins get 99 notifications popping saying i have a new message. So i sign in and there are no new messages. 99 notifications every 30mins! I have had to turn my phone off, which makes it really hard to be reached by others! Plz fix this ASAP!!!

title: Piece of junk
review: No way to request help. Try to verify who I am and it can‚Äôt send a verification text to my phone. It says my number is invalid. There is no customer service or number to request help. Why would anyone trust a company like this with sensitive information is beyond me. They either need to get smart or sued and go out of business. Either way USELESS APP!

title: Design failure
review:
This app is almost useless because of the poor GUI - extremely small type in message part, thin line type throughout makes it difficult to read, no home button? 
This needs to completely redesigned to make user friendly.

title: It‚Äôs getting there...
review: The idea to make the patient experience for virtual appointments and managing care is obvious with the features like medication, appointments, messaging, records, etc. The app user experience needs polishing and developing, though. PLEASE, give us a medicine tracker to actually tick whether or not medicine has been taken.

title: Works, no problem, very helpful.
review:
Works fine, very helpful. 

A few small tweaks would be nice, some might be controlled by my doctors office. For example, sending message to doctor/office options could include more routing options.

title: Terrible
review: I‚Äôve spent the last 30 minutes trying to reset my password. The app kept saying ‚Äúconnection lost‚Äù before it took me to the reset page. I finally was able to log, accept the terms, then connection was lost AGAIN. This is very frustrating and I would prefer just a phone call from the doctors instead of this time consuming app.

title: Cannot access my provider
review:
After being kicked off and having trouble re-establishing my account. After several attempts to get password via email, went to text.  Finally got re-linked with my provider. 

But now unable to send a message. I‚Äôm in my provider account, but won‚Äôt allow me to send message on app and cannot find my doctor during search! And I‚Äôm in my doctor‚Äôs account. This is a vital health issue.

Also tried on-line. Even worse!

Only an on-line FAQ for help. 

Need this application. Hard to get a hold of the doctor otherwise. 

Please fix this. People‚Äôs health and even lives may depend upon this! This is Serious!

title: Convenient but unreliable and a little confused
review: While generally good to get messages to doctors‚Äô offices the responses are often difficult to read or repetitive.  In addition the application (and this is for the whole on line program) doesn‚Äôt handle multiple facilities using the program.  Continual lockouts.  Poor interface

title: App needs improvement
review: Look at some other healthcare provider apps to help you understand how it should work. Does not search for Doctors easily and freezes often. This app has potential but needs an overhaul 12 plus years old and it performs like it!

title: Easy breezy
review: I use the site all the time. It has everything I need to know right there in one spot. It‚Äôs a breeze to use.

title: Not good
review:
Confusing interface. Not very intuitive. For a medical app, this has surprisingly bad legibility issues - font too thin and small, not enough text contrast, text can‚Äôt be resized. My eyesight isn‚Äôt even that bad but I have issues making out some words and info.

Apparently the developer went for style over good usability. Shame

title: Issues w/additional provider account!!!
review: I have 2 medical providers using this Healow app, however, I can only access one provider. Please help! The provider that I am able to access was the original provider.

title: Poor App terrible customer support
review:
This App is very poor - the web site is not any better.
 It does not allow special characters like parenthesis in messages. It crams results (written by doctors) into a narrow little column. It does not allow rotation to landscape mode. There are no phone numbers to contact support, all you get is emails with someone in India.

title: Messaging needs improvement
review: The app is great, but I would like to be able to reply to a message rather than have to start all over with a new message. I‚Äôm sure it would help the provider too.

title: Unsure: hard to use
review: I can log into the app but I can‚Äôt view future appointments and it‚Äôs hard to navigate like most health care stuff. This is the only app my physician uses. There are a lot of physicians with options there.

title: Not working
review: Not sure how the rating is 3.6 when the reviews are nearly all 1 or 2 stars stating the new version isn‚Äôt working. I‚Äôm very tech savvy (built iOS apps) but can‚Äôt get logged in nor contact support. Yes, I‚Äôm on the latest version of iOS 13. Am able to log into the eCW portal via a browser, meaning my ID, password and account are working fine.

title: Like with qualifications
review: Healow provides a lot of information that I find very helpful. What I find frustrating is the login procedure. For example, today I can‚Äôt login through my computer but I can on my iPhone.

title: Bad app or bad doctor?
review: Not sure if the app is bad or my doctor isn‚Äôt using it correctly. It is very frustrating using the app. Nothing seems to work correctly. I tried sending a message to my DR today and the app said I can‚Äôt use special characters such as ‚Äú‚Äò‚Äú. So I‚Äôm not allowed to use punctuation when communicating with my doctor?? Absurd.

title: Dr Jantin Daas And Staff
review: I Love My Doctor And His Amazing Staff but this App is the Sprinkles on Top of the Icing!! Amazing way to Communicate with my providers staff without leaving a brief message and waiting for a call back to get a real message to the Doctor then a call back, whew! LoveLoveLove!

title: Tough To Get Working As Advertised
review: I was thrilled to have this to access my health records, send a message to my physician and make an appointment. Very difficult to access. I would really care to have prescriptions able to be renewed. I hope you will make this better.

title: Nice app with flaw
review: I‚Äôve used app for a while and liked it. Just recently it will not show records anymore with an error message always indicating login failed at the moment and try later.

title: App demands 24/7 access to camera and microphone
