review: I would love to use this app to check my medical records. However , the app demands 24/7 access to microphone and camera. In 2021 that is unacceptable. The app needs to allow the option not to access these. If and only if access is required for right now would I ever allow this.

title: Health App Integration
review:
Until Healow integrates with the iOS health eco-system it‚Äôs an inconvenient and disparate set of records that might as well reside in a paper folder. 

Useless for sharing or referencing comprehensive health data.  

Double the uselessness if your healthcare provider doesn‚Äôt use it - ‚Äúonline check/in‚Äù and then being handed a clip board when showing up at the office? Really?

title: Crashing
review: This app was amazing the first few times. Now this app seems to crash 20 minutes I have a television appointment. When I try on PC the loading takes about 20 minutes to finish vitals. Very unresponsive.

title: Email reply not working
review: The App worked fine up until about a few weeks ago. Now when I try to open a email rely from my physician, the reply is just one continuous line of text not in a paragraph like it used to be. Hard to read.

title: Cheaper sleep study
review: So glad he sent me to Georgetown Sleep in Ky was hundreds of dollars less than hospital charged for the same study. Thanks doc for looking out for me and not the billion dollar non-for profit hospital

title: Does the job
review: I‚Äôm liking this app, because my doctors use it. I was able to get set up easily and input their clinic codes and am now seeing my lab results and upcoming appointments.

title: Night and Day
review: Usually you say an app, program, or os, changes the whole office. But this has enhanced my doctors abilities to really give the care to me and all the other patients. Truly grateful. üññüèº

title: Deborah Marmon
review: I‚Äôve been seeing Dr. Jennifer Weatherly and Nurse practitioner Jan for long time. The medical care and needs are always met. Excellent, caring office staff. They‚Äôve kept me healthy by preventing problems when possible. Thanks to them all!

title: Great app!
review:
This app is very easy to maneuver thru. I like to be able to find my records quickly and or contact my doctor via email 
This does all of that and more!

title: Great product
review: I love this app.  My Dr hasn‚Äôt activated all the features but medications, test results and appointments alone are great. Hope he activates the rest soon.

title: No iPad support
review: I use my iPad much, much more than my phone and although the app works on an iPad it‚Äôs only in portrait mode. It is a pain to have to turn my iPad to read the app. Please make an iPad version or allow landscape mode. Thank you.

title: Worst health app available
review: The interface for mobile is poor, almost impossible to read. Implementation with my doctor has been difficult and plagued with stop/starts. Data is often not available. Only useful function is appointment tracking and even that is annoyingly laid out.

title: Privacy Concerns
review: This app appears to REQUIRE that you grant full access to your iphone‚Äôs microphone and camera.  It also requires notifications to be turned on.  It will not let me register without granting access.  If I want to use these features, I will grant access to do so.  Privacy doesn‚Äôt appear to be a choice anymore.  Will not use this app.

title: Poor participation by the medical practitioner
review: It appears that the app could work well if the medical group would use it. We were asked 3 or more years ago to install the app. Without the medical group using the app it is useless.

title: Works great, but limited in language. We need option for Spanish speaking patients
review: If app were to provide Spanish as an option, it would make things much easier.

title: Good app
review: So far I am using this application to get in touch of my doctor and see all my paperwork like labs result and all what I need to know and keep tracking of all medications I taking

title: Doctors are the ones that put in the data, the app is good!
review: As with any app that contains information, doctors and other medical professionals are the responsible people for the information or lack there of.

title: Difficult to Setup, missing info, MyChart is better
review: Initial setup difficult, system couldn‚Äôt find my doctor‚Äôs clinic.  Had to repeat setup several times.  Once linked, app didn‚Äôt cross over some information, like labs.  Also, because of the layout, it makes it difficult to find things.  I like MyChart better.

title: Review
review: I‚Äôm very impressed with how easy it is to use and find it very helpful in tracking my medical history.

title: Difficult to see and read or adjust medication.
review:
The light blue/white  on colored background  (very little contrast) and small print is very difficult to see and read. 

 No way to revise/adjust medications other than re-entering as new medication.

 Would also like my provider to have access to info from my iWatch such as afib info, ecg results and fall info.

Added meds to list. Closed App. Went back in - new meds no longer listed. 

At this point will not use app. Too unreliable. Will deal with doctors‚Äô offices and labs directly.

title: Won‚Äôt connect to server
review: The app used to work okayish, but I cannot connect to server. Deleted and reinstalled and now it won‚Äôt accept any of my credentials. Just freezes. V frustrating as I keep getting emails notifying me that my dr has sent me stuff through their portal that I now can‚Äôt view and have to keep calling my drs office to get the info.

title: Makes managing your health so easy!
review: I absolutely love this app. I can watch my lab results and track my health as well as contact my doctor with the click of a button. Would highly recommend!

title: Permission hungry junk
review: This app is awful. It does not need camera & microphone access but the app won‚Äôt let users login until permission is granted. The web app is terrible as well. These developers have absolutely no idea how validation works. This is the worst app I‚Äôve seen in years. I wouldn‚Äôt trust my data with this company in a million years.

title: Healow>. As unusable as software can be
review: Spent 40 minutes, wasted.  Next time to get med test files will just drive to doctor ‚Äòs office. It may take longer, but at least you have a tangible result, not more fighting Healow which will claim you are not who you believe you are.  (For the record, I am computer savvy, as have created several websites.)

title: Can‚Äôt link accounts
review: I can‚Äôt link accounts and have notified support.  I keep receiving the same email asking me if I could get them linked and I respond each time with No.  I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app, among other things.  It isn‚Äôt worth the frustration anymore.  I‚Äôll just CALL my doctors to get results, make appointments, etc.  It will be a lot easier!!

title: Healow
review: Would be a nice thing to have IF it were updated but by the time my info is updated a year has passed.. I had labs done 2 months ago and haven‚Äôt seen or heard anything about them and when I ask it‚Äôs oh, they were aight!! Gees I feel like I‚Äôm talking to some teens in the streets

title: Great app
review: Love this app! I love being able to check my kids stats and everything on my phone. Never have a problem with it.

title: Facial ID
review: What a great addition to your website to add facial recognition!  Love the ease of logging in and not having to look up and peck in my password.

title: Never Works
review: I‚Äôve deleted the app and reinstalled it so many times. I just have to conclude this app doesn‚Äôt work. Furthermore, the activity log section hasn‚Äôt worked in at least 2 years, which demonstrates to me this company doesn‚Äôt take this product seriously for a bug to be 2+ years old.

title: Requirements to access
review:
I choose not to set facial recognition or a passcode for my phone. Instead I use a password for each application 
I‚Äôve never had an application NOT allow you to access their app unless your phone has facial recognition or a pass test up. I absolutely can‚Äôt even set up a logon!  Ridiculous!

title: Phone-only app, no tablet support
review: App is ok, but it is a phone-specific app, which you can use on your iOS tablet, but the user experience in that case is a bit disappointing.  Hope they develop a tablet version.

title: Apple passcode requirement is a no go
review: I used to use this app happily. Now the app requires me to set a passcode on my phone and iPad in order to use the app. I don‚Äôt lock these devices and I won‚Äôt be locking them in order to use this app.  Please restore the previous functionality so I can use the app again. Until then, I won‚Äôt be using it.

title: Crashes consistently
review: I always get an error whenever I‚Äôm trying to look at my records or meds or anything. It gets fixed for a couple days and does the same thing again for a few days with the same error. Works again, then crashes again‚Ä¶.

title: It‚Äôs Ok
review: Lots of neat features but I guess I have to talk to my doctor to get more info on there. Also I set my reminder for 10 am daily but it goes off every night at midnight.

title: Bugs
review:
The app could be great but it has key bugs. Probably the biggest one is the feed back links are not working so you can‚Äôt report any issues. I can‚Äôt use the app. It will not allow me to select a provider. 
I tried to report the issues in app but that part of the app is also not working.

title: integration with Apple watch and Apple ‚Äúhealth app
review: As far as i can tell.  there is no support for this.  I use Apple Watch to track all my activity including sleep health and exercise.  I wish this app would pull the data from health and add it to the healow trackers

title: Poor design and user interface
review: The pastel colors and microscopic print make this app not only hard to use but dangerous.  Feels like it was designed by millennials to look cool, but the major of the users are Xers and above.  Can‚Äôt read things, can‚Äôt find things, counter-intuitive at every step along the way.  No wonder my hospital loves it.

title: Won‚Äôt accept correct credentials
review: The app will not accept my credentials. I reset them THROUGH THE APP to what I was pretty sure was already my credentials. Then I entered the same again and it still wouldn‚Äôt take it. So I deleted the app. What good is this if it‚Äôs impossible to log in. The web version is pretty decent though, better than most doctors portals.

title: Texts Sent: No Consideration
review: Here was my first experience: A text arrived this morning reminding me it was time to schedule my ‚Äúbreast cancer screening.‚Äù Well, three months ago I was diagnosed with breast cancer and had a bilateral mastectomy. To add insult to injury, I was asked if I had a recent mammogram, and if not, contact the office to schedule one. Really?!

title: Will not remember me
review:
I can not get this app to remember me. I reset a password and am able to login ONE time, but five minutes later, if I try to login, the app doesn‚Äôt remember me or register the correct password. I always have to reset my password EVERY TIME to see my medical records. It also will not remember my doctor office. 

Out of all my doctors applications, this is by far the worst. It‚Äôs useless

title: Needs BIG improvements
review:
First time using and it doesn‚Äôt recognize my nurse practitioner. Put in a Dr. name and it wouldn‚Äôt let me choose the correct location of two even though it was displayed. 

Tried to look up alphabetically and you can‚Äôt even start with the correct first letter. You have to start with letter a. 

No one has enough free hours to make this usable. DELETE!!

title: Nice for easy access to records
review: I can see my results right away and don't have to remember my complicated password for the site. I wish my Fitbit tracker was supported, the sun with the Fitbit site is very slow

title: So-so
review: I've used other patient portals in the past that were much better. This app doesn't show you a complete history of emails that were sent as well as received. Also lacks the ability to reply to a specific email. Definitely needs some improvement.

title: Easy to use
review: For appointments & messaging to the doctors office the app works well but for reports ( blood work) or medication lists the app lacks the ability to print, which would be a big plus to the app.

title: Errors
review: This app has a long way to go. The messaging features are less than ideal. You can‚Äôt even reply to a message from your Dr. also, lately, I keep getting notifications saying that I have a new message. I log in and there is no new message.

title: Crappy useless app can‚Äôt attach photos
review: Useless app. Constant internal error when I try to check in. Cannot attach photos to doctor nurse or TECH SUPPORT on why I cannot check in! Guess I‚Äôll miss my tele health appointment! What if I need to attach photo of medical problem? Can‚Äôt use app on mobile / screen size distortion. Fix your stupid app and join this century! Wow

title: Customer Service
review: None.  No help sign on retrieving password available from Healow or my provider.

title: Applications message system is horrible.
review:
The message system on the iPhone cuts of text and then wraps after many more characters. When you see it on the screen you see a message with a bunch of words cut out of the middle. There is NO indication that there are words that are cut off.

In my case it it completely changed the meaning of the message.

 IMO this application is dangerous in that it causes miscommunication due to a horrible interface. 

Word wrap has existed for at least 50 years. This software was written by someone that doe not know what they are doing.

title: Blank screen when logging in.
review: I open the app and login, and it‚Äôs blank. The info don‚Äôt appear. I log out and try opening it again...same thing. It‚Äôs EVENTUALLY, when it works properly. But i dont know when it will quit working again. Needs a fix!

title: Cannot Log in again (really bad bug)
review: I managed to log into this app yesterday and see all my basic medical history. Now today it‚Äôs refusing to let me log in, it keeps saying invalid username/password and I reset my password 3 times and it‚Äôs still refusing to let me log in since it‚Äôs saying both are still incorrect.

title: Easy enough to use but ...
review: Easy enough to use when I remember my password. Sometimes I'd rather call the doctors' offices. When I get a warm receptionist on the phone who's willing to speak with you, it's a better interface than any app. Perhaps old school.

title: Worst app
review: I have a family of 4 I do not want to create log ins for each one of my children. If they have the same insurance and the parent takes care of their apts  why not have the children fall under a parent like every other app. If CVS Frys ans Walgreens can do it so can you! The function of this app is weird and the people in the office do not use it much so they can not help. MAJIOR BUGS!!!

title: Needs to sync with Apple Health and allow reviews from within the app
review:
The title says it all- the app doesn‚Äôt sync with Apple Health so that is a huge downfall.  When you try to use the apps help/review function the Captcha isn‚Äôt recognized.

My doctors office does a decent job interacting/communicating through the app, the app itself is just so-so.

title: Does The Job
review: Can‚Äôt complain as I get my test results, am able to see my upcoming appointments, and can contact my providers.  There can always be more bells and whistles but not sure they‚Äôre really needed.

title: Worst App
review: We were excited to try this app and it seemed to work correctly at first, but then it quit working even with the updates. The location services for pharmacy refills does not work at all even after multiple tech service requests. Our doctors have even tried using it and have had no luck. Such a disappointment.

title: Ask for things that is not needed
review:
This app will not let you use it if you do not have a passcode on your phone witch is crap. It did not use to be this way but for some reason they changed it. Not cool at all 
A app should not make someone do something with there phone they do not want to. Just to use their app

title: Does not rotate
review:
Dear app developers, 
Many of us use apps on our iPads and other tablets. 
We have cases that work in landscape only. In fact, most tablets have the charging slot on one of the short sides. Any app that does not rotate is not ready to be released. Period. Now get on it. 
Like you should have to begin with. Who knows, maybe I will use it?

title: Unable to log in
review:
Pros- I like the simple layout and organization of app, ease of use and ability to msg clinicians from each area. 

Cons - **** I am only able to successfully send messages half of the time in app. So frustrating!!!!! I have even deleted and reinstalled. Can write message, then I hit send and it says login error, unable to send. 

Could not sync Bluetooth BP device despite many attempts. 

Very rudimentary abilities to sort and compare data (other med apps let you see lab results, BP over years in a graph, etc).

title: Waste of time
review: I thought this would be a useful app because i got an email saying I could view my recent labwork online. After downloading and trying to make an account unsuccessfully I just stopped trying. There is no way to make your own account and no continuity between devices. I thought it was just click and done. I was wrong!

title: Outdated
review: This app is a joke and not a funny one. Seriously, a pin? And no Touch ID? This app looks like something I would‚Äôve used four years ago. I think it would be convenient and pleasant to use if it got updated. As is, it‚Äôs slow, clunky, and has crashed 5 times in the hour since downloading.

title: Better but still needs improvements
review: Better but still needs improvement. Take a look at my chart. Adapt some of their functionalities.

title: You need a new developer.
review: I keep getting emails saying I have labs that need reviewing in the portal and when I open the app there‚Äôs nothing there. It gives you poor instructions on how to navigate through the app. Nothing that should be there is there.

title: Message feature
review: The message feature is a little wonky. Not able to reply and doesn‚Äôt allow a subject. Needs work

title: Doesn‚Äôt connect or sync with apple health
review: Title says it all.  Very limited options to sync and the app is NOT user friendly.   It‚Äôs an organizational nightmare and needs to be completely overhauled.   For something as important as your health, you‚Äôd think this company would make these vital records more accessible and user friendly.

title: What happened
review: Prior to the last two updates I had no problems with this app, now that it‚Äôs been updated twice it doesn‚Äôt open at times , it closes unexpectedly and now it doesn‚Äôt even open up . I‚Äôm over it

title: Worst app!
review: This is the most frustrating app I‚Äôve ever used! I have two docs that use it and setting it up for each is ridiculous. Since I‚Äôm not using it for virtual appointments, I‚Äôm deleting it. Its an endless bunch of prompts to set up passwords and passcodes only for it not to recognize you the next time you use it. Goodbye Healow

title: Healow
review: Requires you to set an Apple password for your device.  Don‚Äôt mind setting a password for the site but I am not going to lock my IPad up with a password every time I want to use it.  Get rid of this stupid requirement.  If you read the reviews you would see the criticism you are getting for this requirement !

title: Don't bother trying
review: This software doesn't work on my iPad so don't bother trying. It's very frustrating and in the end I found that Dr's notes and very little else was entered anyway. Read the other reviews about this software, they're almost all negative and reflect the experience I had as well.

title: Totally worthless
review: My doctor sent test results through this app.  I am unable to set it up and after trying six times, I have give it up. It‚Äôs too convoluted to set up and it doesn‚Äôt recognize the doctor, office location, or practice name. Don‚Äôt cause yourself frustration. If I could give no stars, I would.

title: Results of blood work
review: I finally got access to Healow(?) for results of my blood work. Do not send again because I don't know what it means. I left word at your Ofc twice asking for assistance without a response. I will assume everything is normal. This is an example of why I seldom go into the office. Dr. S asked me why. I am wondering if it is time to move my health care to a more responsive practice.

title: Easy to use
review: I was surprised at how easy it is to navigate once I had gotten used to it. Makes life easy for my busy schedule.

title: Very, Very Good.
review: I don‚Äôt even know where to start, absolutely the best staff and doctors, they are responsive and courteous.  Thank you all for helping me through this part of the journey.

title: Great app
review: It's good because it keep you up to date . This app is easily accessible and safe for all females of different ages. It's also better because there is  NO PAPER WORK

title: Great Communication Venue
review:
Love the ease of communicating with my doctor.  She is quick to react or reply in accordance with the message.  I am so glad my doctor offers this is part of her service.  Thank you.

Martha (Pete) Tanner

title: Not worth the effort
review:
It's clunky; doesn't include payments; I can't read test results through the app (not formatted correctly); the messaging part cuts off my provider list, et al. 

It's just not worth the effort. It's easier just have an offline list of appointments and medical information than contend with this app.

title: Not acceptable. -  HIPPA violation
review:
The app associates me with the wrong Provider. 
Can not read lab results...no portrait mode or ability to resize.
The app is definitely not ready for prime time on any iOS platform...and appears to be in flagrant violation of HIPPA. 

Unfortunately this is an example of how dangerous poorly designed & written apps can be...and how insecure personal information is in the hands of incompetently run companies.

title: The people who make this app are idiots.
review: For one, there is still no iPad app, only iPhone. And for two, there is no way to sign in, if I try the button to login does nothing. Also, for three, it is not secure if you need to ask me security questions like what my favorite pet is. Also for four, I CANNOT even login!

title: Unstable
review: Every time I attempt to use this app, it tells me I‚Äôm not linked to my doctors portal yet when I attempt to sign on to the portal it tells me I‚Äôm linked in. If I press any of the tabs, it will give me an error message or completely kick me out of the app. I‚Äôm sure it can be a useful app, but so far, it‚Äôs no more than an annoyance.

title: No Apple Health Integration
review: What is this?  Why are there so many options to integrate health information but the big ones are absent.  It really looks like Healow has a deal with Fitbit and Withings for tracking because Apple Watch isn‚Äôt even an option for tracking. I feel very unenthusiastic about this app. The med history is nice.

title: Horrible medical records system
review: Impossible to log in, impossible to manage family members (children), impossible to communicate with care team. Still trying to get the healthcare team to move away from this awful system. App just as bad as web interface.

title: Great program to keep organized.
review: Great way to keep organized on appts, drugs, and records.. it does take a little while to learn.

title: Not able to reset password during initial login
review:
No error message, just frozen screen. Stuck on the page to reset password after validate phone number. Never get the chance to see the rest of the UI.
Webpage stuck at the same page as well

title: I hate this app
review: Looks like it was made in the 80‚Äôs and not in a good way. The website is a nightmare and tech support is none existent. You can only contact by writing on their site but it doesn‚Äôt send. It‚Äôs been saying send for 20 minutes. I will reach out on sociomedia since they don‚Äôt have a phone number.

title: App worked for a bit‚Ä¶.
review: This app worked for the first few months I used it now I can‚Äôt email my doctor‚Ä¶.the app won‚Äôt even find him‚Ä¶.tech support keeps making suggestions that don‚Äôt work because the app is super buggy it would seem‚Ä¶.hope they get their stuff together‚Ä¶

title: It‚Äôs not a good app
review: I can build a better app! Contact me if you would like help! I‚Äôve sign in to the portal on a web browser just fine even though that needs a lot of help as well! But the app when signing in doesn‚Äôt even give you the option to sign in with a established account

title: Erased my providers
review: I know in the past this app worked well to show me my results etc. However, now it asked me for my login information for each doctor and when I put it in it says I'm already registered!! I suspect this is an update bug and hope they fix it soon!

title: Frustrating
review:
What an awful experience. The app worked ONCE when it was first installed, since then, nothing. 
Despite repeated contact with customer support, I am unable to open ANY of the messages from my physician. I wonder if there is anything vital that I am not receiving. 
In an age where electronic records are in use everywhere, this is completely unacceptable.

title: I keep getting invites for this, useless
review:
This app is not helpful when you have 4 people in your household to manage with doctors, prescriptions, follow ups, etc. 
it‚Äôs frustrating when you can only register one person. Every other medical app I have I can see every person, all their payments, coverage, cards, etc. 
This is not helpful as a parent!

title: Does as advertised
review: Only been on it for 3 months.  Keeps track of everything.

title: Application Review
review: I like this app!   User friendly...  easy to follow.    Less complicated than other apps some of my other doctor's use!!!!

title: Great idea - but clunky to use
review: Hard to navigate to messages to respond to them. I like having the app available but it is clunky and not really user friendly.

title: Great app üëç
review: This is a great app, just a little glitchy. You have to try a few times to get things accomplished and sometimes you get booted out.......needs a few more bug fixes.

title: Needs work
review: The app is difficult to navigate, unintuitive and outdated. There was an update, presumably to ‚Äúfix‚Äù the observations made by earlier reviewers but now the app requires me to change security settings on my iPad in order to use the app, which I do not want to do.

title: Cannot create an account
review: I can‚Äôt seem to get past creating a security question page to set up my account. I press ‚Äúconfirm‚Äù after filling out the form but a new page does not load. I‚Äôve tried deleting the app and reloading and closing the app and activating it. Just doesn‚Äôt seem to work.

title: App is unusable
review:
When I type in my desire password it says ‚ÄúStrong Password.‚Äù When I push confirm it says, ‚ÄúPassword is very weak please choose a stronger password.

I have tried 25 different passwords, extremely random passwords created by a strong password generator‚Ä¶ all resulting in the same series of events.

Don‚Äôt waste your time!

title: Badly designed app
review: The message feature needs significant improvement. I cannot send image attachments via the message feature, nor can I respond to a message I receive from my doctor. Rather than have a single email chain, I have to write a new message every time. So annoying.

title: Basic issues
review: Please hire a new coder please! Crashes music apps when closing.. sends notifications hours if not days later. Oh and today I‚Äôve had over 200 notifications for absolutely no reason. Honestly get a new coder.

title: Doesn‚Äôt load my data. Doesn‚Äôt submit forms right.
review: This app is terrible. Blank screens with no data. Makes you fill out forms then chokes and resets you‚Äîhappens in many areas. It‚Äôs been deeply frustrating. Caused me to miss multiple appointments. Finally gave up. It‚Äôs riddled with bugs. I‚Äôm a coder. This is fundamentally bad engineering in practice.

title: Update found my visit summary
review: After I wrote a negative review I downloaded the latest update and then was able to view the visit summary. It contained complete thorough records. Sorry for the negative review

title: Doesn‚Äôt Work
review: I get an email that says test results are available. The app is a way to access the data. I follow the directions and set up the app. But app won‚Äôt recognize me or my medical practice. After utilizing various ways to access practice and with no luck, it is clear that app doesn‚Äôt work. Too bad as would have been nice. Waste of my time.

title: Personal health App
review: Grate app! I gave it ‚Äú4‚Äù stars because it does not connect to my Apple watch that tracks all my workouts and steps. That would be awesome if that app picked up the Apple Watch.

title: Awesome App
review: This app tells you so much and reminds you of your next appointments with your doctor and medications you were given.

title: Great app
review:
I‚Äôve loved being a patient of Dr Pejic. Now I love the app to be able to almost effortlessly manage my visits, appointments and info/records. 
Great app thanks to the person who had the idea

title: Reply / new
review:
New message needs to have previous messages doctors at the top. 

There needs to be a REPLY button to the doctor perhaps with the statement: simple hi/bye messages are unneeded and use up doctors times. But it‚Äôs a mess if you have a really important question to ask.

title: Not helpful
review: App would be more helpful if information was entered or entered correctly, be able to enter notes yourself, schedule or cancel appts, request medication refills; Ask Dr or Dr‚Äôs nurse specific questions, i.e. about medication, test results, etc. All this app lets me do is look at categories that are mostly empty.  To me, it‚Äôs useless.

title: Not working
review: I have been trying to log into the app for about a week now and it keeps giving me an error. I even deleted the app, put it back, and it still doesn‚Äôt work. This is very frustrating!!

title: Excellent
review: Let‚Äôs me help keep track of my own health, can see results quickly!

title: It needs improvements and updates
review: I use other medical apps, and this one is a pain. It has major glitches, and the information it‚Äôs not updated. Not sure if it‚Äôs my doctor‚Äôs fault or the developers or a combination of both. Horrible to deal with. I don‚Äôt like it at all. Thumbs down‚Ä¶

title: Wants full permissions to everything to log in
review: Downloaded just trying to pay a bill and the app requires full access to everything just to initially log in. Streamline a bill pay if you push folks to download the app when paying a bill.

title: Horrible
review: My mom has been trying to get her Covid results back but no one has given her, her login or even trying to help her. It‚Äôs been an hour and no one is helping. We tried calling but no one answered and no one is answering the emails. Very unprofessional especially when someone is trying to get help.

title: Needs improvement
review: I have a new Dr that utilizes the APP.  I can barely read the messages. The font is way too small. I don‚Äôt see a way to respond back. It seems I need to write a new msg back to the Dr.

title: Needs more improvements
review: Needs more improvements I can‚Äôt see my upcoming appointments and also most of the information regarding my health is not updated in here

title: Doesn‚Äôt work on iPad, iPhone
review: By accident I opened my account from outside the app and was shocked at all the information there that does not show up when I go thru the app. Also, thought my doc was ignoring my messages. Now wonder if they ever got them. I‚Äôll never use this app again.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
review: I had the app on iPhone. Tried to open today and said new app was available and old would not work. New app DOESN‚ÄôT work

title: Will not work on my iPhone 8 Plus
review: I was able to add my providers onto my iPad mini, but it will absolutely not let me on my iPhone 8 plus. It will not allow me to enter the practice name or the practice code/phone number. This is a big FAIL! I mainly wanted it for use on my phone since that is what I take to the doctor with me. I don‚Äôt carry my iPad with me, ever. So disappointing!!!

title: There has to be a better app
review: Two major problems. Graphic design is terrible and light blue on a white background hard enough to see in daylight. Even worse for aging eyes. Second issue is that there appears to be no app for an iPad. I use it only because it is what my physician's group supports.

title: Do better
review: This is the clunkiest medical app I have ever used. It doesn‚Äôt let you schedule appointments, leaves you hanging in limbo, yet keeps reminding you of a procedure.  Instead of saving time by online access, you still have to call. And folks, covid is on the decline!

title: UPDATE THIS APP
review:
I‚Äôm under several doctor‚Äôs care and get testing done every month for various issues. Just started with a new doctor, did dozens of tests and of course the tests are listed but the results pages are all blank. 

This happens all the time!

This app is supposed to be a tool to help patients and medical staff to communicate with each other better as well as get the information we as patients so badly need.

You‚Äôd think in the era of Covid, the developers would make sure this is constantly up to date and working correctly.

Fix this app!

title: Works fine
review: I find the login with pin annoying. I like being able to see my daughter's health information from the doctor right on my phone. It's awkward that it greets me with her name. It would be nice if appointment scheduler worked.

title: Useless
review:
Have spent 30 minutes trying to reset my password, done it successfully about 10x but app and website won‚Äôt accept it. I‚Äô ll likely be dead before I can access my critical health records, but hey, I‚Äôm sure hackers can get in and access them at will...

I give up. I‚Äôll call the doctor instead.

title: Clunky
review:
The concept is good but the execution is poor. Often impossible to get a message to send, with error pop ups that don‚Äôt make sense. Had a doctor appointment today and she agreed it‚Äôs problematic.

Addendum Feb. 2019. It‚Äôs clunky. Not intuitive. Doesn‚Äôt interact with local health providers and hospital‚Äôs own app. Basically useless.

title: Love
review:
The app is very helpful to me. I don‚Äôt have to worry about forgetting my appointments. I can check test results as well. 
Thank you for the wonderful app!

title: Patient User
review: Not a fan.... the app is delayed in reflecting information emailed from the Healow system. Provides very little information. Lab results do not always fit the device screen, and are sometimes only partially viewable because of this formatting issue. It‚Äôs a nice idea for an app, but needs several bugs worked out to be worth utilizing.

title: Interesting idea, decent layout, no Apple Watch support
review: I want to like this app more but it‚Äôs kind of clanky, if your health provider doesn‚Äôt add data you‚Äôll never see it, and it doesn‚Äôt support Apple Watch.

title: Customer
review: Awsome being able to view info on healow

title: Happy to have
review: I can keep up with my records and email with the Doctor

title: Disappointed User
review: At first I had no issues of logging into see my records. But now when I try to login, it said unable to go into my records try again later. I have tried several times and it give me the same error. I am verrrrrrrrrrrry disappointed with this app.

title: App is great but
review: The app is now requiring me to have a passcode on my phone to use it. Hello, I have to enter a PIN to get into the app. I DO NOT want a passcode on my phone!!! I understand it‚Äôs best to have a passcode on your phone for safety reasons but you shouldn‚Äôt require people to. It is at my own personal risk, UGH!

title: NFG
review:
This app that is supposed to make it easier to communicate with the Dr office does not work as advertised. 
They ask for a facility, the drop down is blank and won‚Äôt accept any facility typed in. this prevents me from sending a message and responding to my Dr. This is one of the worst apps for medical.

title: WORTHLESS APP
review:
I never shows doctor‚Äôs note on visit summary as well no written result can be see. They only show numbers.

When I complained.. they are not ready to fix the issue and replied that the app is designed to show only numbers.

Then My feedback is for app is ‚ÄúHEALOW IS GOOD FOR NOTHING‚Äù I never recommend this app to be used ever.

WORTHLESS APP better to uninstall this unnecessary healow app for using my phone memory. Better to use  web portal every time. 

Such numbers and value we can be easily seen on Lab/diagnostic centers app or website. 

I never recommend this app to be used ever.

title: Needs Apple Health integration
review: This app works great with my doctor‚Äôs practice, but it‚Äôs unfathomable that it does not work with Apple Health/HealthKit. I shouldn‚Äôt have to buy a new tracker for this app when I have an iPhone in my pocket or an Apple Watch on my arm.

title: This is the worst app ever created!
review: There‚Äôs no way to create a log in even if you‚Äôve never used the app, then the password creation process makes no sense, and then to check in to an appt. it gives you a barcode to scan, but it‚Äôs an app so what do you do with a barcode ON your phone? The app designer REALLY cheaped out and blew it on this app. DO NOT EVER USE!

title: Needs optimization for iPhone X
review: Great app, very useful, shows me all my test results, upcoming appointments, I can send messages to my doctor, etc. my only issue is this app not being optimized for iPhone X.

title: Absolutely convenient!
review:
I appreciate many things about this app. 
The opportunity to view my Rx..
As many views of my lab results and Dr. notes..
All in one place. Nice!

title: It‚Äôs OK
review: I really enjoy using the app. However, with a person that has low vision it would be nice that there were darker colors and larger print. It‚Äôs hard to distinguish between the light blues in the white.

title: Doesn't work
review: Total junk. Will not retrieve information from my linked account. Cannot open messages from my doctors office, have to use the phone. Went thru some effort to set up the app with my doctor's office and it still doesn't work. The interface is odd and confusing. Already spent too much time on this thing.

title: Awesome
review: The apps has been and continues to be very useful and user friendly. Thanks

title: Can‚Äôt login for most of the time
review: Downloaded the app this Monday and experienced many failed login attempts. No matter from the website or app you can‚Äôt login anywhere. Don‚Äôt know if this is caused by the server or just doesn‚Äôt work out. Can‚Äôt login and view your health records.

title: No reply button
review: It‚Äôs highly annoying you can‚Äôt keep a chain of messages going because there‚Äôs no ‚Äúreply‚Äù button. You have to create a whole new message every time!!! Annoying.

title: Terrible App
review: With today‚Äôs technology this app seems to be about and act like it was developed in the late 80‚Äôs. I find it totally useless and the customer service unacceptable in today‚Äôs market place. After many attempts to use this app I finally gave up on it and deleted it from my iPhone.

title: Great app
review: Awesome app great for managing dr appointments and meds and talking with doctors but would greatly appreciate it if your trackers( fitness tracker) could support Apple Watch. I really don‚Äôt want to buy a new fitness accessory.

title: Good app
review: Works great, easy to use, I like it for the groups information , I would like to see more information about the meds I take, side effects,purposes etc

title: So far this morning it says I have 35 messages...
review: I don‚Äôt know what is happening, but I don‚Äôt have any messages. Must be a glitch in the system. I hope they fix it quickly because it‚Äôs highly annoying.

title: Done
review: I spent hours trying to find my doctor on this horrible app. I already have an app/account on my iPhone for Healow and trying to use my iPad it doesn‚Äôt even have my doctors name, phone number or even the state, not to mention My name. Nothing, while I have to go to my phone for a video consultation. UNBELIEVABLE!

title: Love this app
review: This app does what I need it to do. Keeps my information in one place. Reminds me of upcoming appointments etc. Glad to have access.

title: PLEASE, update to support X, Xs, Xs Max!
review: I like the app for what it is, just wish it were updated to support my Xs Max‚Äô screen. Face ID to login would be great as well. Again, please update to support the newer generation iPhones‚Äô features/screen realestate!

title: Doesn‚Äôt support Apple Watch
review: My only complaint is that they allow you to add health tracking devices except Apple Watch. Other than that it‚Äôs a very helpful app!

title: Basic Edit Function Needed
review: I had to send a note to my provider and I could not because I had used an apostrophe in my text. The app does not allow apostrophes....or apparently any other ‚Äúspecial characters‚Äù. Seems like that is a basic requirement of a messaging app...

title: Love it
review: I‚Äôm üòç  the app , to be honest it‚Äôs the best ! You can send messages directly to your doctor and they answer you right away .

title: Does work well with Apple
review: This app doesn‚Äôt sync with the Apple Watch but does with some unknown brands. I wonder how much they were paid to plug those brands. Also, when I went to send them a message their website doesn‚Äôt even work on the iPhone. Get with the program, guys.

title: Needs to be Apple friendly
review: It‚Äôs not a bad app but it doesn‚Äôt talk to Apple Health or Apple Wallet (vaccine records) or Apple Watch! It‚Äôs is 2021 and you were smart enough to make an Apple app, give it some connectivity to Apple products.

title: I love my Healow
review:
It makes it so easy to contact my doctor.
I will use any excuse not to make a phone call, 
but the app removes that excuse from my arsenal of avoidance.
Thank you.

title: Visibility of Low Contrast Pages
review: I have a cataract in one eye which makes low contrast pages hard to read. Y‚Äôall‚Äôs is one of those.

title: Issues
review: It‚Äôs not letting me see my test results! I have already spoken to the doctors office they are trying to figure out what is going on! Maybe the app needs an update!?!

title: Accomplishes the bare minimum
review: The app is unintuitive. Worse, it has a tendency to be buggy around seeing responses from my provider. That would probably still be 3 stars. It‚Äôs 1 star because it offers the ability to download the health record as an xml, but it‚Äôs not properly formatted to be imported into the health app.

title: Not updated so doesn‚Äôt work above OS14
review: The developers have not updated the app, so on iPhones running iOS 14 or above it says that the app cannot be opened because the phone is jailbroken (even though it is not). This has been a known problem since September 2020 and there is no excuse not to fix it.

title: I NEED medication reminders
review: Hey why do the medication reminders keep resetting to midnight and screwing me over? I have reminders for a reason, and the fact that they keep changing to midnight when I'm supposed to take them before bed is extremely dangerous depending on the medication, fix this immediately

title: I need help!!!
review: My phone is used for both mine & my 91 year old dad‚Äôs medical. How do I set up a separate Healow account for me? I have an appointment tomorrow afternoon. PLEASE HELP ME

title: Can‚Äôt read results well
review: You can‚Äôt read the results due to the fixed width on the results page. Can‚Äôt you make them somewhat dynamic to fit properly in the screen size?

title: Can‚Äôt send a message to my Dr
review: I keep getting a message that I‚Äôm using unsupported characters and or emoji‚Äôs.  However, that‚Äôs not the case. After spending 10 minutes of trying to remove grammatically correct characters used in English 101,I gave up. What‚Äôs the point if it doesn‚Äôt work? Fix the app.

title: Impossible to log on
review: I use 40 plus app that I must log onto. I spent an hour attempting to log onto this app and still failed. It did not help that it was in 3 point font and in pale non contrasting colors. Still with a magnifying class I was unable to set this app up. Hope you have better luck. Crow

title: The app has been Hacked
review: During my first install when I logged in to my provider the app required that I create a new PIN to unlock my phone. Not only did I already have a PIN, but no app should ever need the PIN to unlock a physical device unless it wants to hack into it. Providing my phone PIN to an app would also violate the terms of my cellular service.

title: Worst app!
review: This is the worst app I have ever had to deal with!! I have to use it so I can connect with my doctor, no one at his office knows what they are doing & can‚Äôt tell me how to register, I‚Äôve watched & followed their utube video several times & I‚Äôm following their instructions but keep being told log in error or unable to find patients name!!

title: Useless and Pointless
review: I was told about the app and started the whole reset password process but can never log in as it tells me the new password chosen is weak. Pretty sure a 27 digit password that contains lowercase, uppercase,  numbers, & many symbols is no where close to being weak. So i can‚Äôt rate this app more than one when it cannot even be used....

title: As A Veteran & Hard Head Husband
review: This app has truly been a blessing to me and my wife because she no longer gets at me for missing appointments or keeping up with my meds. Thanks it‚Äôs great!

title: Needs Improvement
review: This app is not very stable. Some days it works and shows all of my information and the next day it doesn‚Äôt list all of my doctors. Definitely needs improvement!

title: Great app!
review: Every time I get any kind of test that my doctor has ordered, I get the results on this app. It's awesome!  And it highlights when my next appt is. I love it!

title: No waiting on the phone.
review: I love this app. I can check my records and make appointments without waiting on hold on the phone.

title: Horrible
review: I can not even get started as the "get started" button will not let me in unless I set up a passcode on my phone, which I do not want.  I had this app several years ago with a different doctor and I did not have a passcode on my phone.  It was an OK app at best, I hardly ever used it.

title: Garbage
review: This app I awful it so hard to communicate with my provider. I see a therapist for anxiety and having to use this app feel like some awful immersion therapy. Moving forward anyone I‚Äôm interested in seeing who uses this app will be automatically taken out of the running.

title: Needs Apple Health compatibility
review: I enjoy being able to review test results through the app and send messages to the doctor. But I wish my Health app activity and stats would push to this app.

title: Text size
review: Can‚Äôt read the text in the app too small so I maxed my phones text out now it‚Äôs too big and everything else overlapping and all that good stuff and still can‚Äôt read the app without glasses

title: Doesn‚Äôt even work
review: Unfortunately I downloaded this app for the sole purpose of being able to view my labs and results. But when I go to view them, all I get is a ‚Äúloading‚Äù circle and it never loads. Disappointed that my provider uses this app.

title: Now requires that you use a phone passcode
review: I refuse to use this app now that it requires you to not only have a PIN number for the app, but also requires that you set up a lock on your phone!  I do not lock my phone and I never have, never will.  This is an utterly ridiculous requirement

title: Great app
review: This has worked out for me just perfectly

title: Terrible app
review: The app is terrible to use. The website is just as bad. I wish my doctor would use something different. Trying to change your password on the app is impossible. The website captcha doesn‚Äôt even show up. Complete junk.

title: No option to log in
review: The app is useless. I can log on via the website, but the app Doesn‚Äôt even have the simple option to log on. I have to find my doctor as though I‚Äôm creating a new account. But according to the app my doctor  doesn‚Äôt exist. Waste of time.

title: Total waste
review: As usual my doctor‚Äôs office has been really pushing this app for several years, and when I finally humored them and downloaded the app, the ‚Äúsimple‚Äù account setup was ludicrously complicated. SO much easier to just call their office to make an appointment. I deleted the app immediately.

title: Unneeded block
review: App seems great and does its job well, there is no reason to have any sort of device modification detection in this. This app is used to contact your doctor and seek help. This is an unneeded security feature that blocks people from getting the help they need and is wrong, there are other ways to do this security better.

title: Face recognition
review: The app support Touch ID which I do not have on any of my devices, they all have face recognition only, the app needs an update to include that feature

title: Please update for iPhone X
review: The App is ok,  but needs to be updated to support iPhone X screens. It‚Äôs been over a year since the phone came out so I would expect the app to have been updated by now. Also, can you add Apple Watch support, especially for tracking  calcifies, walking, exercise?

title: Only a PIN?
review: I downloaded this app and was surprised to see that it only needs a 4 digit PIN for access. For my health info. That is very surprising given the level of security required by apps that have a lot less sensitive information. It should require a 6 digit PIN or fingerprint or something more.

title: Worst portal
review:
I am on 4 doctor‚Äôs portals, this by far is the worst. 20 million $ a year for this?? This looks and runs like a program from the 80‚Äôs. 
Half, if not most of the time, parts of it (like messaging ) are down.
Messaging is antiquated, fonted in old school typewriter with unknown symbols before and after message. 
It does about half of what is available on my other portal‚Äôs. 
I filed a complaint with my health care provider. 
My provider is clearly getting ripped off!
Thanks but NO THANKS!!

title: Great app.
review: Love the fact that I can communicate with my doctor directly and request refills on medications.

title: Loose the passcode
review: I enjoyed this app until it makes you have a passcode. So I set up a passcode which I did not want to do,  And now since the update you cannot make virtual appointments from the app and information is missing.

title: Horrible
review: Terrible app. Tried 3 times to access portal, kept getting a message that my user name and password were invalid. Tried to sign I using doctor name and practice, app said they had no information on them. Frustrating. Way too complicated to use. Waste of time.

title: Pitiful
review: Updated and had to start over. Not intuitive to use. Typical gatekeeper to keep us from communicating directly with medical professionals like the rest of the world communicates. If I tried to use something like this to communicate with my customers, we‚Äôd go out of business.

title: Terrible
review: This app is the sole platform for communication from my healthcare provider and I could not be less satisfied. Connectivity issues, incomplete information recorded, and a severely slow loading time for all services. Being that this app contains medical information and services I think it is awful that it performs so poorly.

title: Keeps asking for login PIN after logging in
review: Can‚Äôt rate an app properly when I can‚Äôt get past the PIN screen! I log in and get ready to check the appointment screen but I can‚Äôt stay on it. The PIN screen keeps popping up after every log in. I‚Äôve deleted and re-downloaded the app. I‚Äôm using this on a 1-2 year old iPad.

title: Useless App
review: This app is useless. It is impossible to log into and I am tired of fighting it by continually resetting my password in the hope that it might work someday. Also just because I GOT A NEW PHONE does not mean that I have to jump through hoops because I used another device to access my account four years ago.

title: New phone
review: I got a new phone and it‚Äôs asking for practice codes etc.   I would have thought I could just use my email and password!

title: Horrible app
review: I‚Äôve tried for years to get this app to work without success. I enter my passcode and it lets me in for 2 seconds before asking for the passcode again and again. The one time I was able to access the info it was helpful. The other 20 plus time couldn‚Äôt get it to open with the passcode.

title: Health app access
review: The app has good information but the developers need to catch up to the times and make the data accessible through the health app.

title: Very bad experience
review: It takes 1h to set and is still unsuccessfully. So I quit . And also after hour service is also terrible. I called for 8 times, i heard that someone picked up the phone and they just hang up. I don‚Äôt often comment on an app, but I am really angry this time.

title: I wish you‚Äôd fix this
review: This would be a great app, IF it worked. It never works. Once I open the app I can never open results. It takes forever and says log in failed. It‚Äôs really upsetting. I‚Äôve had it for a month and it‚Äôs worked right ONE time. Please fix this

title: Hard to read

title: Can‚Äôt find my after visit summary

title: Not good
review: This app leaves a lot to be desired, does not update in a timely manner, only allows you to see certain things, cannot contact anyone through messages. I could go on but what‚Äôs the point?

title: I have been trying to find my doctor
review: I already have the app but when I retired to add a second doctor , I can‚Äôt find her and the customer service gave me an answer that doesn‚Äôt work either.

title: This app is frustrating!
review: Every time I try logging in it asks me to reset my credentials. After I do, it takes me back to the login screen and starts this same process over. Yet I can use the same credentials to login on the website just fine.

title: doesn‚Äôt work
review: this is the first time i‚Äôve ever written a review. i had my phone unlocked and left it on the screen so it could load to login in for HOURS and nothing happened. i tried for hours and nothing happened. i‚Äôm sad because this app sounded like such a good idea.

title: Not compatible with password managers
review: The most irresponsible thing you can do as a developer nowadays is to release an app that does not allow you to paste IDs and credentials copied from a password manager, especially in the type of app where user login security is critical. Shame on you, eCW! You should be encouraging the use of password managers, not actively discouraging it!

title: Able to download my records

title: Was good, but not now

title: This app stinks and is useless!
review:
This app stinks and is worse than useless.
Tried innumerable times to get a password approved. No matter how complicated or long I made them, it said they were all weak and refused to approve them. So I couldn‚Äôt open the app. Never had this trouble before.

title: Great
review: User friendly and an easy way to communicate with your doctor

title: Agree it‚Äôs absolute garbage.
review: I can‚Äôt send a message to my doctor because apparently some characters I used in my message ‚Äúaren‚Äôt supported by the app.‚Äù I don‚Äôt know what OS I have and don‚Äôt know how to ‚Äúturn them off.‚Äù  My other doctor uses a different Patient Portal, and although it took me hours to figure it out, eventually I did.

title: Just ok, MyChart by Epic is better
review: It‚Äôs not a bad app, it does the job, but the messaging platform to communicate with your care team is barebones.  Native email client harkens back to the 1990s. See Epic MyChart for a well executed patient portal app. Disclaimer: I‚Äôm a healthcare administrator.

title: Fine. But only during a pandemic.
review:
Healow is flawed, impersonal technology that connects you with your doctor and keeps you at arm‚Äôs length. Your physician is unable to observe subtleties that can only be seen in-person.

It does, however, increase the doc‚Äôs profitability since s/he doesn‚Äôt have to waste time with anything other than necessary clinical talk. Less talk, more patients. More patients, more money.

‚ÄúYa feel OK?  Great.  Now I‚Äôll go on to the next caller‚Ä¶!‚Äù 

Healow is perfect for America, where healthcare is all about doctors and their dollars.

title: OK app, annoying bug

title: Doesn‚Äôt work

title: Very average

review: I‚Äôm never late because it tells me when my appointments are!!!

title: Doesn‚Äôt Support Apple Watch and HealthKit
review:
The medical info works for the most part, but not having Apple Watch and HealthKit support to link my data automatically is a huge letdown. 

As of right now, the data syncing is completely useless on Apple devices.

title: Ok but lacks some features
review: Should be able to read our own past sent messages...like the providers website portal does.

title: Disappointing After Years
review: Interface requires too many steps to do essential things like find provider. Can't sync with iOS Health app, Omron devices. Information is inaccessible or lost.

title: Please Change the Color
review:
Not Visually Friendly 
Baby blue is too light a color for me to see. I can‚Äôt read it. Navy blue is a better choice for my eyes. Not visibility friendly.

title: Health?
review: Nice to see my health info via an app but would appreciate if it worked with Apple Health so I could have everything in one place. Especially labs and vitals.

title: Easy and fast.
review: Excellent app. Very easy to navigate thru. And very functional.

title: Unable to reply to messages
review: Update needed so we can respond/reply to the physician instead of starting a new message

title: Forces phone pin
review: This was app was a great tool but with a recent update it now forces you to set up a pin for your phone. You already have a pin for the app but it wants you to have a pin on your phone. Frankly it‚Äôs no one‚Äôs business if I have a pin on my phone or not.

title: Incomplete
review: The app lacks the ability to connect to my Apple Watch and track my steps or other vitals, or allow Apple‚Äôs Health app collect medication or lab results.

title: Text unreadable!
review:
Easy to use except the text is rendered in not black but a light grey!  Not able to read on an iPhone‚Ä¶.attempts to report this issue leads to an inoperative web page ‚Ä¶truly frustrating!
2nd issue is that lab reports flow in as a continuous line of text‚Ä¶.

title: No Apple Watch support
review: Extremely annoyed that you‚Äôre unable to add Apple Watch under trackers. Fitbit, Google Fit, even Nokia, but not Apple Watch/Health. Yes, you can manually add your steps/distance, but honestly, it‚Äôs not worth the hassle.

title: Horrible app! Can never see my appointments
review:
Every time i have an appointment it is listed in the app, but i can never see it the day of the appointment. Here we are for the second time ive missed an appointment because i have no clue where or which doctor its with! 
Really lame app. DEVELOPERS, GET IT RIGHT ALREADY!

title: WORST LOGIN EXPERIENCE EVER
review: I have been trying to login for half an hour now. Reset my password I don‚Äôt know how many times. And still can‚Äôt get in. Kept saying invalid login credentials. Never seen any app like this before. HORRIBLE!!! If you don‚Äôt know how to build an app, you can contact me directly!

title: Need to add Apple Watch tracking
review: Good app but not nearly as useful as it could be without the ability to sync with my Apple Watch. Apparently it syncs with other trackers like FitBit and Google Fit but not the equally popular Apple Watch and Apple Health.

title: They sell your contact info
review: This is the only app/service/company that has ever had my name spelled a certain way. After using this I‚Äôve been getting spam texts that have my name spelled that way in them. Avoid using this

title: app crashed
review: Even tho‚Äô I was able to log into app while trying to look at my records it‚Äôs suddenly said I did it gave access and all of my messages disappeared. I don‚Äôt know how to gain access to the data in my file any long.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
review: Looks like this company must have gotten federal funding and has not fixed the app since then. Neither my physician or I have been able to set my portal up after repeated tries. Junk. My physician and I have used email for the past three years and will continuing doing so. IMHO, this is a scam.

title: Text size
review: A basic function of an app setting should be to be able to adjust text size, especially for a medical app. This app has ‚Äúwonderful‚Äù complexities which would be ‚Äúwonderful‚Äù to explore except, I strain to read it so... its garbage.

title: Data disappeared
review: I loved Healow when it worked - would have given 5 stars.  Somehow all the data got wiped out and my doctors office technical department was unable to get it back into the app - even though I can get it on their online portal.

title: Fine, but needs to add Face ID support
review: Haven‚Äôt used the app for much but it really frustrates me that they only ask to enable Touch ID when I only have Face ID on my phone(11 pro).

title: JUNK!
review: Giving a rating of *stars just because you love your doctor and or staff is stupid! He and is has staff have nothing to do with this app! Wasn't the intent of this app to streamline your connections to your dr's office? It's useless.  It works perfectly on my laptop, the app for iOS 11 won't even allow me to log in.

title: Dr. Wendy Quirino and staff
review: I‚Äôm very thankful and happy to dr. Quirino an her staff. They were gentil, kind, answered all my questions, and always prompt to make sure everything was okay.

title: Less functionality in new release
review:
I cannot open messages at all. I used to be able to do refills but that is no longer showing as message or in medications 

PLEASE return functionality

title: Review
review: This is handy when I'm not at home and need access to what meds I'm taking. Just remember, it all depends on your physician as to how good this app can really be.

title: Paperless
review: I love this app it keeps me informed of my doctor appointments, as well as my lab results, and medical records. All in one easy location.

title: No problems so far
review: I've had a few months.... It's ok. I like keeping up with my appts and meds. So far my dr's outside keeps things up to date..

title: Love how easy it is to use
review: I love how easy it is to use. It has everything I need right at my finger tips!

title: Reviews were right
review: At first the app was amazing! It let me see my chart days before my provider would even call me, now I can‚Äôt even log in. I tried signing out and uninstalling the app and still nothing. Very disappointing.

title: It‚Äôs not easy
review: The old system all the buttons worked I had no problems communicating. With the new set up I‚Äôm having a difficulty communicating with my doctor or his assistance I have a problem trying to request refills.

title: Doesn‚Äôt even open
review: Upon opening the app, it shows the splash screen for a split second then crashes. Tried everything I can to fix but it doesn‚Äôt seem to be an issue on my end.

title: Healow app
review: This is great for deaf people need communication talk with doctors important stay information everything health üëçüèªüëåüèªüôÇ

title: Need passcode on phone
review: Dumb you have to put a passcode on your phone in order to get started with the app. I see the security issue but I don‚Äôt like the passcodes or Face ID on my phone it‚Äôs annoying an inconvenient.

title: Worthless App
review: The app cannot find a large corporate medical group, a large hospital or my doctor who has been in practice for 26 years. It doesn‚Äôt work no matter what detailed information you provide or how you enter it. It is worthless and laughable.

title: Font Size and Contrast a ((BIG)) challenge1
review: In spite of having good info, the font size is small, doesn‚Äôt expand with a finger spread and has terrible contrast.  I have to run for my magnifying glass to use it, so convenience is terrible with any vision challenges.

title: Tha absolute WORST
review: This is the most useless horrible app I have ever used. I t doesn‚Äôt allow me to add all of my surgeries or my Primary Doctor. It won‚Äôt let me sign in much of the time and doesn‚Äôt specify if my Doctor visit is in person or virtual. I absolutely hate this joke of an app!

title: Just so hard to read!
review: If you changes the white lettering against the light blue background, I‚Äôd give it 5 stars. But I dread opening it bc I can‚Äôt see to navigate through it and I have decent vision! The colors are pretty bit really hard to see the letters!

title: Can‚Äôt figure out how to view statement
review: I am logged into the app trying to find my statement and how to find out where in the app I can make a payment but can‚Äôt for the life of me find anything statement related or a button that says make payment

title: Terrible application
review: Difficult and frustrating to use unless you remember you credentials flawlessly. It send you an email and does not recognize you fill the information consistently with the email.

title: Fail
review: New update from 2 days ago failed-it will not download for iPhone. I have plenty of memory, no payment issues, no connectivity issues that I know of. This is our primary means of communication with my father‚Äôs doctor and he is gravely ill.

title: Needs health kit support
review: My biggest concern is the support of health kit. Other than that it‚Äôs fine. Glad I can see my appointments. Messaging interface is clunky, but it does work at least.

title: Works great if you don't have iPhone XS Max
review: This worked great for me when I had the iPhone 6s plus. Since I upgraded to the XS Max, I cannot send messages because it will not populate the provider or location

title: Worthless App
review: I‚Äôve been trying to use this app off and on for the past 4 years.  I keep deleting it and adding it back hoping it will be better but no improvement.  It‚Äôs frustrating when I want to see my information or results.

title: Can‚Äôt ever login
review: Haven‚Äôt been able to login since I‚Äôve gotten a new phone. I‚Äôve tried changing my password and such, works on the old phone, won‚Äôt work on the new phone. Kind of pointless if I can‚Äôt login to use it.

title: Helpful app
review: Works well for me and gives easy access to what I need.

title: Can‚Äôt get most info to show up!
review:
None of my information shows up on their app or site it just says no information. The only things that show up are labs and med list. 

I can‚Äôt get my vitals or med problems to show to show! I also can‚Äôt get appointments to show either. Useless

title: Terrible app
review: Due to the many issues (frequently shutting off, can‚Äôt read or send messages, etc.) with this app, I only use it occasionally to see if they fixed the issues. They haven‚Äôt. So I have to go online to read and send messages to my doctor.

title: Tedious
review: I found it tedious. Seems like I have an app for every dr & every thing else in my life. I just glaze over when I start having trouble with it.

title: Great app, accurate and user friendly
review: I don‚Äôt anything negative to say about this app.

title: Easy to use!
review: This app is very easy to use and I love having my records and appointments at my fingertips.

title: Could this be any worse
review: One of the most user unfriendly apps I've ever used. My primary care physician isn't even listed, and while I lived in Georgia my account is linked to a practice in Tennessee. Typically login takes multiple attempts before success. If I could give it zero stars, I would it is truly a üí©.

title: Poor, limited
review: This is a poor and limited way to interface with your physician. This must be a free App for the Doctor as it has no function. You cannot communicate with anyone. You cannot pay your bill. You cannot request script refills. You cannot obtain any information.

title: Logging in
review: I‚Äôve tried for two days to log in and it still won‚Äôt let me in. Tried everything, tried the app and just as bad. Now I don‚Äôt know how to log in and pay my bill. Hate this whole system

title: Ellen
review: I‚Äôm a senior and it has a been really easy so far to navigate. But I haven‚Äôt had to use it much.

title: Trash
review: Doesn‚Äôt work. Plain and simple.  Trash.  Don‚Äôt waste your time. And even more so, I would question any doctor‚Äôs judgement who uses this app.   If this is how they make technical decisions, I can only imagine how bad their judgment is with medical decisions.  Find a doc and a new app!

title: Sends constant notifications
review: There is a bug in this app. I keep getting notifications for hundreds of new messages and there is nothing there

title: Zero Stars
review: My privacy is important. This developer collects both personal and sensitive information including Government ID. This developer also shares this information.... no thanks. I will not be downloading this app. Call your Dr and request records, it‚Äôs not that hard people. Protect yourselves!

title: Almost, but not quite right
review: I shouldn‚Äôt have to change my correct grammar and punctuation to INCORRECT grammar and punctuation just to get a message to get to my Dr‚Äôs office!  Other than that, I would give it 5 stars.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
review: I FINALLY had this set up and working on my iPhone by facial recognition. It was a relief to have the facial recognition log in set up because it never works. A few days later I try to log in and it tells my credentials are wrong. My account is always being locked. COMPLETE WASTE OF MY TIME.

title: Slow to connect
review: This app has potential...but most of it seems useless.  It‚Äôs cumbersome to use.  It‚Äôs slow to connect.  It lacks Apple Health integration.  It has no notifications (or if it does, they don‚Äôt work).  It‚Äôs not tied into Epic.  It feels like the app is 10 years behind any other health app out there.

title: Updated version needs work
review: This app was great to organize my appointments, medicines, and lab work but after the recent update I can't access my information.

title: It helps
review:
This app helps me find lab results (and not misplace them). 
I can see the Doctors notes about my visits. I'm very pleased.

title: Why can‚Äôt you import into Health?
review: Have been using this app with no problems but don‚Äôt understand why The app is not available to import data and my records into the Apple Health app.

title: Doctor not using
review: Appears to be a good application if doctors use it. No visit summary information, no test results, no information except your appointment information. Too bad doctors don‚Äôt use it.

title: Awesome
review: Being able to communicate with my Doctor is Awesome!!!

title: Love y
review: Having the ability to communicate with my doctor and see my records is great!!

title: Trouble with app
review: The app does not show appointments, the medication section does not show all medicines, it freezes constantly. It does not have up to date medical records and this is really challenging when needing the information for specialists.

title: Always a problem
review: I appreciate the convenience of the app but it is constantly buffering or not recognizing my credentials or timing out just a complete pain when my caregiver uses this to communicate due to COVID

title: Terrible
review:
If you‚Äôre going to have a mobile app for use, make sure it works and supplies all information available from the doctor.
Only item this app shows is that I made an account.
Horrible App!

title: Doesn‚Äôt work deleted.
review: Just dld and deleted. No matter what password I put in it says to weak n will not let me confirm. I tried multiple xs with increasing long passwords. Using numbers symbols n letters. Same response! ü§¨Dislike time wasters. Deleted as it appears to be useless.

title: Messaging Feature Needs Work!
review: Overall, the app is helpful but the UI/UX needs serious work. Also, please make it to where we can respond to messages instead of creating a new one for the same instance.

title: Mark
review: This is the worst portal for being user friendly!  It is like going through a maze to get logged on and or finding on the internet apps.  Chinese must be in on it!  Who knows who is actually getting the info!  Just my opinion.

title: Love this app, just one request for future update

title: Log In is infurating
review: I know they are stuck with HIPPA but logging in to view one‚Äôs children‚Äôs data is very confusing and frustrating and so far impossible. Also, it does not seem set up well for co parents and other non traditional families

title: Poor visibility
review: For those of us who have vision limitations, this app is barely usable.  The text size is too small and cannot be increased (or I can‚Äôt see how to do it) and the low contrast between the white background and the aqua colored text makes the visibility even worse. Please make this app 508 and WCAG compliant.

title: Very buggy
review: This app has a lot of potential but it needs to work out some bugs that cause lab results not to render, for example. I got an error message even when I tried to report the error.

title: So Much Potential Wasted

A very clean app that is easy to navigate and runs very smoothly. Until you actually need any information about your records or messages.  

Messages are not formatted to the app correctly, making them irritating the view and navigate. 

Medical Results do not always appear in results tab, making you struggle through the incorrectly formatted messages. 

All the building blocks are in place for this app, all that is left is delivering the information to the user.

title: Nonexistent support
review: App is slow and clunky, support is not responsive, and overall right now it‚Äôs a waste of space. I will give it another chance since it may be the link to the Dr‚Äôs office but I expect an app like this to be able to talk to the EHR at the Dr‚Äôs.

title: Useless
review: If I needed my blood pressure raised to threatening levels, I would try to use this app! The fools who have 3 different apps for one patient should be fired! Really‚Ä¶,Dosher Patient Portal, Healow and My Care Corner!! Why?  If your medical care is as bad as your IT, you need a mortuary . The dead don‚Äôt need a patient portal!!

title: App really stinks
review: The online version is great, but the app does not mirror it. The app has potential and I love easier access through my phone but adding your physicians is entirely too cumbersome to be worthwhile. I‚Äôll access it through Safari.

title: No Apple HealthKit support
review: This app can work with random third-party trackers, but not the built-in Health Kit and Apple Watch. It would be able to provide so much more useful information if it supported those.

title: Rate of app
review: I like the app except I cannot figure out how to send a message to my doctor.

title: Remove the iPhone facelock
review: Due to medical reasons my kids need to have access to my phone so I can not put a lock on it. I can‚Äôt use this app because it‚Äôs requiring not only a lock for the app but one for the phone itself!

title: Extremely poorly designed and coded app
review:
This app is a disaster at nearly every level. If your doctor uses this let her know that the app reflects very poorly on her business. 

Overall an extremely frustrating and inoperative app

title: Cannot do what I need to do

title: If I could give zero stars I would

title: Needs work
review:
Of the 100+ logins I use, this is one may be the most dysfunctional and arcane. At this point in time ‚ÄúWhy?‚Äù seems like a reasonable question. 
‚ÄùSecurity‚Äù as an excuse/reason has long been unacceptably thin. Other apps get it right, please do the same.

title: Reset my account and no email yet
review: I‚Äôm not sure what‚Äôs going on with their system but I have yet to receive my password reset email. Checked my spam folder.

title: It‚Äôs making it very difficult to do something that should be easy

title: THIS APP IS SO FAR BEHIND IT‚ÄôS PRE 1985
review:
This app is MickeyMouse. It doesn‚Äôt synchronize my iPad or any of my other iDevices. Healow app is way behind; it‚Äô dark ages and have relatively few functions. There‚Äôs no scheduling, no health summaries. Basically, it‚Äôs a portal for: emails and appointments. The provider don‚Äôt update ‚ÄòMY RECORDS‚Äù or ‚ÄòMEDICATIONS‚Äù.

The link devices function is an insulting not funny joke.

title: Wondering the Age
review:
I am considering the app.  Just from reading these few reviews I am wondering the ages of those reviews I read.
Thus, I am coming to the conclusion that both parties must be active in this app.......if NOT.....this angst.

title: Please add functionality
review: I would love to use this app to track physical activity and or diet, much like my app from Livestrong. That may not be your primary focus but it would make it more useful

title: This has potential.
review: This portal has potential to be very good but it‚Äôs of no use if my doctors office doesn‚Äôt put anything in it.
